Ndipo Jezu adamutawira aciti: “Akalinkhoo ana mphako. Mbalame zina bzitsa, tsono Mwana wa Munthu alibe na mbutoyo yakutsamirisa msolo”.
Ndipo Jezu adauza munthu winango kuti: “Nditewere!”
Tsono munthuyo adati: “Mbuya, cakuyamba ndirekeni ndikapendese baba wangu”.
Jezu adamutawira kuti: “Leka anyakufa apendesane wakufa wawo. Tsono iwepo ndoko ukapalidze Umambo bwa Mulungu”.
Ndipo winango adati: “Mbuya, ine nin'dzakutewerani, tsono ndirekeni nditome ndikagonekane na abale wangu”.
Jezu adamutawira aciti: “Munthu ali-wentse omwe aniikha manja pagejo ndipo acimbaceuka, alibe kukondzekera Umambo bwa Mulungu”.
Bzatapita bzimwebzo, Mbuya adasankula ateweri winango makumi manomwe na awiri (72) ndipo adawatuma awiri-awiri, patsogolo pace, kumizinda na mii yentse yomwe Iye akhafuna kuyenda.
Ndipo adawauza kuti: “Bzakubvuna ni bzizinji. Tsono anyakubvuna ni ang'ono-ng'ono. Na tenepo kumbirani Mbuya mwenekaciro wakubvuna kuti atumizire anyabasa kuti adzamubvunire.
Ndokoni! Ine ndiri kukutumizani ninga mabira pakati pa mphumphi.
Lekani kutakula cikhwama, napo budu, napo xango. Ndipo lekani kumusana na wanthu munjira”.
“Pomwe mun'pita munyumba iri-yentse, cakuyamba lewani kuti: ‘Mtendere pa nyumba pano!’”
Panyumbapo pakakhala pana munthu omwe ana mtendere, mtendere wanu un'dzakhala pa iye. Ndipo pakakhala kuti palibe, mtenderewo un'dzabwerera kuna imwe.
Khalani panyumba imweyo, ndipo mucidya na kumwa bzomwe angakupaseni, nakuti munthu wa basa bzin'funika kuti atambire malipiro yace. Lekani kucinja-cinja panyumba.
“Mukafika mum'zinda uli-wentse, mucitambiridwa bwino, dyani bzomwe an'kupasanibzo.
Polesani atenda omwe muniwona m'mwemo ndipo, muwauza kuti: Umambo bwa Mulungu bwafendera kuna imwe”.
“Tsono mukapita mumzinda ndipo mukasaya kutambiridwa bwino, dokoni mumiseu ndipo lewani kuti:
‘Napo pfumbi la mzinda wanu, lomwe laphatirira kundzayo kwathu, tiri kulikunkhumulira imwepo. Khalani wani kuti Umambo bwa Mulungu bwafendera’”.
Ine nin'kuwuzani kuti: “Pantsiku imweyo pan'dzawoneka nyathwa mwa ntsisi pang'ono kuna Sodoma kuposa mzinda ule”.

“Tsoka kwa iwe, Korazini! Tsoka kwa iwe, Betisaida! Thangwe bzidabwiso bzomwe bzidacitika pakati panu bzingadacitikira kumzinda wa Tiro na Sidoni, iwo angadakhumbula kale, mwakubvala masakha ndipo acibvumbvulika padotha.
Tsono pakudzatonga, Mulungu pan'dzawoneka nyathwa mwa ntsisi pang'ono kuna Tiro na Sidoni, kuposa kuna imwe.
Ndipo iwe mzinda wa Kafaranawumi, kodi un'kumbuka kuti un'dzabzikwiza mpaka kudzulu? Nee, iwepo un'dzathusidwa kumbuto ya wanthu wakufa!”
Jesu adauza wakupfundzira wace kuti: “Ule omwe an'kubverani, alikundibvera Ine. Ule omwe an'kulambani, alikundilamba Ine. Tsono ule omwe anindiramba, alikulamba Ule omwe adandituma”.
Pamwepo, atumiki makumi manomwe na awiri adabwerera mwakukomedwa ndipo adati: “Mbuya, na mizimu yakuipa kubodzi bzikhatibvera mudzina lanu”.
Jezu adawatawira aciti:
“Ine ndamuwona Sathani acigwa kucokera kudzulu ninga mpheni.
Tsono Ine ndakupasani mphambvu zakuponda nyoka na anyamkalize, ndipo mukunde mphambvu zentse za nyamadulanthaka. Ndipo palibe cinthu comwe cin'dzakudzongani.
Na tenepoyo kondwani, sikuti thangwe mizimu yakuipa iri pantsi panu, tsono ni thangwe rakuti madzina yanu yadanembedwa kudzulu”.
Nthawe imweire-letu, Jezu mwakudzazidwa na Mzimu Wakucena adakondwa kwene-kwene adati:

“Ine ndiri kukutumbizani, Baba, Mbuya mwenekaciro wa kudzulu na pantsi, thangwe mudabisira adziwi ndipo wakupfundza bzinthu bzimwebzi, ndipo mudabzilatiza kuna ang'ono-ang'ono. Inde, Baba, nakuti tenepayu bzidakukomerani.

“Bzinthu bzentse ndidapasidwa na Baba wangu. Ndipo palibe omwe an'dziwa kuti Mwana ni yani, pokha-pokha Baba. Ndipo palibe omwe an'dziwa kuti Baba ni yani pokha-pokha Mwana na wale omwe Mwana angafune kulatiza”.
Pamwepo Iye adacungunuka kuna atumiki wace aciwauza pamphundzu aciti: “Yakusimbidwa ni maso yomwe yali kuwona bzomwe imwepo muli kuwonabzi!
Ndipo Ine nin'kuuzani kuti apolofita na azimambo azinji akhafunambo kuwona bzomwe imwepo mulikuwona, tsono alibe kubziwona. Ndipo akhafuna kubva bzomwe mulikubva, tsono alibe kubva”.
Ntsiku ibodzi, munthu winango omwe akhali mpfundzisi wa Mtemo adaimirira kuti ayeze Jezu, ndipo adam'bvundza kuti: “Misiri, ni ciyani cin'funika kucita kuti ndidzakhale na moyo wakusaya kumala?”
Jezu adamubvundza kuti: “MuMtemo mudanembedwa ciyani? Umbauwerenga tani?”
Ndipo iye adatawira aciti: “‘Funa Mbuya, Mulungu wako, na m'tima wako wentse, na moyo wako wentse, na mphambvu zako zentse, na ndzeru zako zentse’,
ndipo ‘funambo mwandzako ninga momwe umbabzifunira iwe wekha’
Jezu adati: “Iwepo watawira bwino. Cita ndipo un'dzakhala na moyo”.
Tsono iye, pakufuna kubziyesa wabwino, adabvundza Jezu kuti: “Kodi mwandzanguyo mbani?”

Ndipo Jezu adamutawira aciti: “Pakhana munthu m'bodzi omwe akhapolika kucokera kuJerusalema kuyenda kuJeriko, ndipo adagumana na akambowa. Iwo adam'khundula bzakubvala, adam'menya, ndipo adayenda acimusiya wafumphira.
Tsono baba wa ntsembe winango akhapolikambo na njira imweire. Pomwe adamuwona munthu ule, adamutsembera.
Ndipo tenepoyombo adapita m'Levi. Pomwe adafika pa mbuto ire adamuwona, adatsembera
Tsono m'Samaliya m'bodzi, omwe akhali paulendo adafika pomwe pakhana munthuyo ndipo atamuwona adam'bvera ntsisi.
Na tenepo adafendera, acimutsuka bzironda na kuthulurira vinyu na mafuta acimumanga. Pomwe adamala adam'pakiza pabulu wace, aciyenda naye kunyumba ya alendo acikamucengeta bwino.
Mangwana yace, adacosa denariyo
ziwiri acipasa mwenekaciro wa nyumba ya alendo ndipo adati: ‘Koya munthuyu. Pomwe ine nin'dzabwera nin'dzalipira bzentse bzomwe wadzonga mwakupitirira kobirizi’”.
“Tsono pa atatuwa, iwepo unikumbuka kuti ni muponi wapafupi na mwamuna ule omwe adamenyedwa na akambowa?”
Mpfundzisi wa Mtemo adatawira aciti: “Wapafupi na iye ni ule omwe adamubvera ntsisi”. Ndipo Jezu adamuuza kuti: “Kacitembo bzibodzi-bodzibzo”.
Jezu na ateweri wace akhafamba paulendo, adafika pamudzi winango, adatambiridwa panyumba ya mkazi wakucemeredwa Marta.
Maliya m'bale wace wacikazi adakakhala pafupi na Mbuya, acimbabva mafala yace.
Tsono Marta akhadedema na basa lizinji. Ndipo adafendera kuna Jezu aciti: “Mbuya! Kodi mulikuwona lini kuti m'bale wanguyu ali kundilekerera basa ndekha-ndekha? Muuzeni adzandithandize!”.
Ndipo Mbuya adamutawira aciti: “Marta, Marta! Ulikudedema ndipo ulikucita bzinthu bzizinji.
Tsono, cin'funika ni cibodzi cokha. Maliya wasankhula cinthu cabwino. Ndipo palibe munthu omwe angadzamucosere”.
Pantsiku inango Jezu akhapemba pambuto ibodzi. Pomwe adamala kupembako, mteweri wace m'bodzi adamuuza kuti: “Mbuya, tipfundzisenimbo kupemba, ninga momwe Juwau akhapfundzisira ateweri wace”.
Ndipo iye adawauza kuti: “Mukapemba mbalewani kuti:
“Baba!
Dzina lanu liremekezedwe.
Umambo bwanu bubwere.
Tipaseni cakudya cathu ca ntsiku na ntsiku.
Mutirekere bzakuipa bzathu,
nakuti ifembo timbalekerera
wentse wale omwe ambatiphonyera.
Ndipo lekani kutileka ticigwa
mukuyezedwa”.
Pamwepo adawauza kuti: “Onani, tingalewe kuti m'bodzi wa imwe anaxamwali wace aciyenda kuna iye pakati pausiku acikamuuza kuti: ‘Xamwali, ndikumbizembo pau zitatu,
nakuti ndabweredwa na mulendo xamwali wangu, ndipo ndiribe cakuti ndingamupase’.
“Ndipo ali m'nyumbayo acimutawira kuti: ‘Leka kundinesa. Ndafunga kale msuwo, ine na wana wangu tagona kale. Ningalamuke lini kuti ndidzakupase bzomwe wakumbira’.
Ine nin'kuuzani kuti ‘Napo iye akaleka kulamuka kuti amupase pau pakuti ni xamwali wace, tsono iye an'dzalamuka basi thangwe la kumunesa ndipo an'dzamupasa bzentse bzomwe iye an'funa’.
“Na tenepo nin'kuuzani kuti: Kumbirani, ndipo mun'dzapasidwa. Nyang'anani, ndipo mun'dzabziwona. Gogodzani, ndipo msuwo un'dzafungulidwa.
Nakuti wentse ule omwe an'kumbira ambapasidwa. Na ule omwe ambanyang'ana ambabziwona. Na ule omwe ambagogodza ambafunguliridwa.
“Kodi ni baba mponi pakati panu, omwe mwana wace akakumbira ntsomba angamupase nyoka?
Ayai penu an'kumbira dzai angamupase nyamkalize?
Imwepo wanthu wakuipa, mumbadziwa kupasa wana wanu bzinthu bzabwino, ndiye tani tsono Baba wanu wa kudzulu, an'dzapereka lini Mzimu Wakucena kwa wale omwe an'dzamukumbira?”
Pantsiku ibodzi Jezu akhacosa mzimu wakuipa omwe ukhadasandusa munthu kukhala bewewe. Pomwe mzimuwo udacoka, bewewe adayamba kulewa-lewa ndipo mthithi udadabwa.
Tsono wanthu anango pakati pawo adalewa kuti: “Ni kudzera kuna Belizebu, mkulu wa mizimu yakuipa, omwe Iye alikucosesa mizimu yakuipa”.
Anango akhambamuyeza Jezu, acimbamukumbira cizindikiro ca kudzulu.
Tsono Jezu pakudziwa ndzeru zawo, adawauza kuti: “Umambo bwentse bomwe bun'gawana bucipoka bokha bun'pfudzika, Ndipo banja likagawika licipoka lokha lin'pasuka.
Penu Sathani akagawika acipoka yekha, umambo bwace bungapitirize tani? Ndirikulewa bzimwebzi thangwe ra kuti imwepo mulikulewa kuti ndirikucosa mizimu yakuipa kudzera kuna Belizebu.
Penu Ine ndiri kucosa mizimu yakuipa mudzina la Belezebu, kodi wana
wanu alikucosa mizimu yakuipa na mphambvu ya yani? Na tenepo iwo caiwo ndiwo an'dzatsimikiza kuti imwepo ndimwe wakuphonya.
Tsono, penu Ine ndiri kucosa mizimu yakuipa kudzera ku mphambvu za Mulungu, ni kulewa kuti Umambo bwa Mulungu bwakufikirani.
“Munthu wa mphambvu, akatenepo kuti ana bzifuzo bzakumenya nabzo, acimbalindira nyumba yace. Bzinthu bzace bzimbakoyedwa bwino.
Tsono munthu winango wa mphambvu kuposa, akam'menya acimukunda, ambamutengera bzifuzo bzomwe akhatumba nabzo. Ndipo wakukundayo ambagawa bzinthu bzace bzire.
“Ule omwe ali lini na Ine ambandiwenga. Ndipo ule omwe an'gwezeka lini pabodzi na Ine, alikumwaza.
“Mzimu wakuipa ukacoka muna munthu, umbayenda kumbuto za kucidambo kukanyang'ana kupuma, ndipo ukasaya mbuto, umbalewa kuti: ‘Tsapano nin'bwerera kumui komwe ndacokera’.
Ndipo ukafika, umbagumana nyumbayo idapsairidwa ndipo idacena.
Pamwepo umbayenda ndipo umbakatenga mizimu inango minomwe yakuipa kuposa iwo, ndipo ikapita imbakhaliratu m'mwemo. Ndipo khalidwe la munthu ule limbadzalemwa kuipa kuposa pakuyamba”.
Pomwe Jezu akhalewa bzimwebzo, mkazi m'bodzi adakuwa pakati pamthithi wa wanthu aciti: “Wakusimbidwa ni mkazi omwe adakubala na kukumamisa”.
Tsono Iye adatawira aciti: “Nenene, wakusimbidwe ni wale omwe ambabva fala la Mulungu aciriteweza”.

Pomwe mthithi wa wanthu ukhathimizirika, Jezu adayamba kulewa aciti: “Uyu ni m'badwe wa wanthu wakuipa! Iwo an'funa cizindikiro. Tsono palibe cizindikiro na cibodzico comwe an'dzawonesedwa, kupambula ca Jona.
Nakuti Jona akhali cizindikiro kuna wanthu wa kuNinive. Mwana wa Munthu an'dzakhalambo cizindikiro kuna m'badwe umweyu.

Ndipo Mambo Wacikazi wa Kunyantsi an'dzalamuka kudzatonga wanthu wa m'badwe umweyu, ndipo acidzawapasa nyathwa, nakuti Mambo Wacikaziyo adacokera kwakumalizira kwa dziko kuti adzabve udziwi bwa Solomoni, ndipo ali pano omwe ni mkulu kuposa Solomoni.

Na tenepo wanthu wa kuNinive an'dzalamuka pantsiku ya kutongedwa pabodzi na m'badwe umweyu kuti adzaumange mulando. Nakuti iwo adakhumbula bzakuipa bzawo pomwe Jona adapalidza. Tsono ali panoyu ni mkulu kuposa Jona.
“Palibe munthu ambagasa ciphani-phani aciikha pa mbuto yakubisika ayai acicigwanankhira na citundu. Koma ambaciikha padeca, kuti wanthu omwe an'pita awone ceza.
Ndipo maso ni ceza ca thupi. Maso yako yakakhala yabwino, thupi lako lentse lin'khala lakudzala na ceza. Tsono yakakhala yakuipa, thupi lako lentse lin'dzala na mdima.
Na tenepo, khalani wa cheru kuti ceza comwe ciri mkati mwanu cireke kukhala mdima.
Ndipo thupi lako lentse likakhala lakudzala na ceza, palibe mbali yalene na ibodziyo yomwe ingakhale na mdima, lin'dzakhala lakungwerewera mwathunthu, ninga momwe ciphani-phani cimbacitira kuna iwe”.
Pomwe Jezu adamala kulewa-lewa, m'falizi m'bodzi adamucemera kuti akadye naye. Ndipo Jezu adayenda, acikakhala pa meza.
Tsono m'falizi ule atawona kuti Jezu alibe kusamba mwa misinda akanati kudya, adadabwa nabzo.
Pamwepo Mbuya adamuuza kuti: “Imwe, aFalizi mumbatsuka kunja kwa mkombo na ndiro, tsono mkati mudadzala na mingululi ndipo kuipa.
Apsirumwe! Kodi ule omwe adakondza kunja, ni m'bodzi-bodzi lini omwe adakondza mkati?
Tsono cakuyamba pasani wakusauka bzomwe munabzo mundiro ndipo mun'dzawona kuti bzentse bzidzakhala bzakucenesedwa kuna imwe.

“Tsoka kuna imwe, afalizi, thangwe mumbapasa Mulungu bzakhumi bza Mdimba, tumbeu twakununcira, tumbeu twakukomesa cakudya ndipombo na ca mbeu zentse za m'dimba, tsono mumbanyoza cirungamo na lufoi la Mulungu! Imwepo bzikhafunika kuti mucite bzinthu bzimwebzi mucisaya kuleka kucita bzinango bzire.
“Tsoka kuna imwe, afalizi, thangwe mumbafuna m'mipando ya ulemu m'nyumba za mipembo ndipo kumbamusidwa padeca!
“Tsoka kuna imwe, afalizi, thangwe muli ninga nthutu zomwe zimbawonedwa lini, wanthu ambaziponda acisaya kuzidziwa!”
Ndipo mdziwi wa Mtemo m'bodzi adamuuza kuti: “Misiri, pomwe mulikulewa mafala yamweya muli kutukwana na ife kubodzi”.

Tsono Jezu adati: “Kuna imwe, apfundzisi wa Mtemo, tsoka kuna imwembo! Nakuti mumbanyamuza andzanu mitolo yomwe ni yakunesa kuti iwo ainyamule, ndipo imwepo-letu mumbawathandiza lini napo na cala cokha.
“Tsoka kuna imwepo thangwe mumbamanga nthutu za apolofita omwe adaphedwa na makolo yanu.
Tenepayu imwepo mulikupereka umboni bwa bzomwe makolo yanu yadacita. Iwo adapha apolofita ndipo imwepo mulikuwakondzera nthutu.
Na thangwe limwero, Mulungu muudziwi bwace kuti: ‘Nin'dzatumiza apolofita na atumiki, tsono winango an'dzaphedwa ndipo winango wa iwo an'dzanzunzidwa’.
Na tenepo, m'badwe umweyu un'dzapasidwa mulandu thangwe ra mulopa wa apolofita wentse, omwe udayerera kuyambira pakulengedwa kwa dziko.
Kuyambira mulopa wa Aberi mpaka mulopa wa Zakaliya, omwe adaphedwera pakati pa guwa la ntsembe na mbuto yakucena. Cadidi, ine ndikukuuzani kuti m'badwe umweyu un'dzapasidwa mulandu wa bzentsenebzi.
“Tsoka kwa imwe, adziwi wa Mtemo, nakuti mwapamba m'funguliso wa kudziwa. Imwepo caiye mulibe kupita ndipo mudapingiza omwe akhali pafupi kupita”.
Pomwe Jezu adacoka pamwepo, afalizi na adziwi wa Mtemo adayamba kumuwenga kwene-kwene, acimbamupasa mibvundzo mizinji,
kuti amunyang'anire mathangwe pomwe aniwatawira.

Panthawe imweyo, mthithi wa bzulu na bzulu bza wanthu watakhoncezana, kufika pakumbapondana m'bodzi na mwandzace, Jezu adayamba kulewa-lewa cakuyamba na ateweri wace, adati: “Khalani na cheru kuna bzakufufumisa bza aFalizi, bzomwe ni cipha-maso.
Palibe cinthu cakumpsinkhika comwe cin'dzasaya kuwoneka, ayai cakubisika comwe cin'dzasaya kudziwika.
Nakuti bzentse bzomwe mudalewa pam'dima bzin'dzabveka pakungwerewera, ndipo bzomwe imwepo mudalewa mwakawere-were m'kati mwa nyumba, bzin'dzabvekera pantsodzi.
“Ine nin'kuuzani, axamwali wangu kuti: Lekani kugopa omwe ambapha thupi, ndipo akhamala bzimwebzo palibe cinango comwe ambakwanisa kucita pomwe.
Tsono Ine nin'dzakulatizani omwe an'funika kugopedwa: Gopani Ule omwe, akamala kupha thupi, ana mphambvu za kuthusa mudindi la moto. Cadidi-letu, Ine nin'kuuzani kuti, Umweyo m'gopeni.
Ungagulise lini mbalame zixanu na tukobiri tuwiri? Nakuti palibe na ibodziyo yomwe ni yakuyebwedwa na Mulungu.
Napo tsisi lentse la mumsolo mwanu lentse ni lakulewengedwa. Lekani mantha, imwepo ndimwe wakufunika kwene-kwene kuposa mbalamizo.
“Ine nin'kuuzani kuti: Ule omwe anindibvuma pakati pa wanthu, napombo Mwana wa Munthu an'dzamubvumambo pakati pa anju wa Mulungu.
Tsono ule omwe anindiramba pakati pa wanthu, an'dzalambidwambo patsogolo pa anju wa Mulungu.
Ule omwe an'dzalewa kuipa Mwana wa Munthu, an'dzalekereredwa. Tsono ule omwe an'dzanyoza Mzimu Wakucena, an'dzalekereredwa lini.
“Akadzakutengani acidzayenda namwe kunyumba za mipembo, ayai kuna atongi na kwa akulu-akulu, lekeni kudzakhala na thupo kuti mun'dzabzikhocerera tani ayai mun'dzalewa ciyani.
Nakuti nthawe imweyo-letu Mzimu Wakucena un'dzakupfundzisani comwe cin'dzafunika kudzalewa”.
Munthu winango pakati pa mthithi ule adauza Jezu kuti: “Misiri, uzani m'bale wangu kuti agawane na ine utaka”.
Ndipo Jezu adamutawira kuti: “Mwamunawe, kodi mbani adandipasa basa la kutonga ayai kukugawanisani nthaka pa uwiri bwanu?”
Patsogolo pace adawauza kuti: “Khalani na cheru! Khalani wakudziwa-letu kuti muleke kukhala na m'tima loko-loko wakufuna bzizinji, nakuti moyo wa munthu ulibe basa na kuwanda kwa bzinthu bzace”.
Pamwepo Iye adawauza mfananizo wakuti: “M'munda mwa munthu winango nyakudala mudacoka bzakudya bzizinji.
Ndipo iye adakumbuka mumtima mwace kuti: ‘Kodi nin'dzacita ciyani? Ndiribe kwakuikha phoso langu’.
“Ndipo iye adati: ‘Ndadziwa tsapano bzomwe nditi ndicite. Nin'dzapfudza magwangwa yangu ndipo ndicimanga yanango makulu, ndicidzakoya m'mwemo phosolo na bzinthu bzangu bzinango.
Ndipo ndin'dzalewa ndekha kuti: Iwepo una bzinthu bzizinji bzidakoyedwa kwa magole mazinji. Puma, dyaya, mwaya ndipo kondwa’.
“Tsono Mulungu adamuuza kuti: ‘Nandi wakusaya ndzeruwe! Usiku buno-letu moyo wako unimala. Tsono mbani an'sala na bzinthu bzomwe udakoyabzi?’
“Tenepayu ndibzo bzimbacitika kuna ule omwe ambabzikoyera cuma, tsono pamaso pa Mulungu umweyu ni nyakudala lini”.

Patsogolo pace Jezu adauza ateweri wace kuti: “Ndipopo Ine ndirikukuuzani kuti: Lekani kukhala na thupo na moyo wanu, kuti mun'dzadya ciyani napo kukhala na thupo na thupi lanu kuti mun'dzabvala ciyani.
Nakuti moyo ni wakufunika kuposa cakudya, ndipo thupi ni lakufunika kuposa cakubvala.
Wonani akhungubwe: Ambabzala lini napo kubvuna, ndipo alibe magota napo magwangwa. Koma Mulungu ambawadyesa. Ndipo imwepo ndimwe wakufunika kuposa mbalame!
Kodi mbani wa imwe, acikhala na thupo, angakwanise kubzithumizira nthawe ibodzi pa ntsiku za moyo wace?
Tenepoyo, penu imwe mun'kwanisa lini na pang'onopo kucita cinthu cing'ono, thangwe ranyi muna thupo na bzinango?
“Wonani maluwa yambakula tani. Iyo yambaphata lini basa napo kuluka bzakubvala. Tsono, Ine nin'kuuzani kuti napo Solomoni, muukulu bwace bwentse, alibe kubvala ninga libodzi la maluwayo.
Penu Mulungu ambabvazika mauswa ya mthengo, yomwe yalipo lero mangwana yanithusidwa ku moto, ni tani kuna imwe wanthu wa cikhulupiriro cing'ono!
Na tenepo, lekani kukhala na thupo kuti mun'dzadya ciyani ayai mun'dzamwa ciyani. Lekani kukhala na thupo na bzimwebzo.
Nakuti dziko la wakusaya kupemba ndiro limbathamangira m'mbuyo mwa bzinthu bzimwebzi. Tsono Baba an'dziwa kuti imwepo mumbabzifuna.
Tsono nyang'anani umambo bwa Mulungu, ndipo bzinthu bzimwebzi bzin'dzathimiziridwa kuna imwe.
“Lekani kukhala na mantha, tubzifuwo twangu, nakuti ni kufuna kwa Baba kukupasani Umambo bwace.

Gulisani bzomwe munabzo ndipo pasani wakusauka. Bzikondzereni mabudu yomwe yan'dzongeka lini, cuma kudzulu comwe cimbamala lini, kumweko mbava zimbafika lini, ndipo palibe manthedza na libodziro lingajete.
Nakuti komwe kuna cuma cako, kumwekombo kun'dzakhala m'tima wako.
“Khalani wakukondzeka kuti mutumikire, ndipo bziphani-phani bzanu bzikhale bzidagaka,
ninga omwe alikudikhira mbuya wawo omwe alikucoka kuphwandu la malowozi. Kuti iye akafika ndipo akadzagogodza, adzam'fungulire msuwo pamwepo-letu.
Wakudala atumiki wale omwe Mbuya akabwera an'dzawagumana adamudikhira. Ine nin'kuuzani kuti iye an'dzabvala kuti atumikire, an'dzawakhazika pa meza, aciwatumikira.
Napo iye acidzafika usiku ayai madandakweca, ni nyakudala atumiki omwe mbuya an'dzagumana adakondzekera.
Ndipo dziwani cinthu ici: Mwenekaciro wa nyumba angadadziwa kuti ni nthawe iponi in'bwera mbava, angadaleka lini nyumba yace icicholiwa.
Na tenepo, imwepombo khalani mudakondzeka nakuti Mwana wa Munthu an'dzabwera panthawe yomwe imwe mukhadikhira lini”.
Pamwepo Pedru adabvunza kuti: “Nandi Mbuya, mfananizoyu mulikucitira ife tekha ayai kwa wanthu wentse?”
Ndipo Mbuya adatawira aciti: “Kodi mbani wakunyang'anira wakukhulupirika ndipo wa ndzeru, omwe mbuya wace angasiyire wabasa wace kuti adzawagawire phoso nthawe yace caiyo?
Wakudala wabasa ule omwe mbuya wace akabwera an'dzam'gumana alikucita bzimwebzo
Cadidi nin'kuuzani kuti iye an'dzamuikha wakunyang'anira bzinthu bzace bzentse.
Tsono tingalewe kuti wabasa umweyo angalewe mumtima mwace kuti: ‘Mbuya wangu ali kucedwa kubwera’, ndipo aciyamba kumenya wabasa acimuna na wacikazi, acimbadya, kumwa na kuledzera.
Mbuya wa wabasa umweyo an'dzabwera pantsiku yomwe an'dikhira lini na panthawe yomwe an'dziwa lini, an'dzamupasa nyathwa yakuwawa caibzo ndipo an'dzamupasa mbuto pabodzi na wakusaya kukhulupirira.
“Wabasa omwe an'dziwa bzin'funa mbuya wace ndipo iye an'kondza lini napo kubzicita, an'dzachangidwa kwene-kwene.

Tsono ule omwe an'dziwa lini ndipo acicita bzinthu bzomwe bzin'themera nyathwa, an'dzachangidwa pang'ono. Omwe an'pasidwa bzizinji, an'dzabvundzidwa bzizinji. Ndipo ule omwe adakhulupiridwa kwene-kwene, an'dzakumbiridwa bzizinji.
“Ndidabwera kudzaikha moto padziko la pantsi, ndipo kufuna kwangu kukhali kwakuti nthawe ino ungadakhala udaphatizidwa kale!
Tsono bzin'funika kuti nditambire ubatizo, ndipo ndidatsukwala mpaka bucitike!
Imwepo mun'kumbuka kuti ndidabwera kudzaikha m'tendere padziko la pantsi? Nee, ine nin'kuuzani kuti ndibzo lini. Kusiyana kwace ni kwakuti ndidabwera kudzaikha kupambulana.
Kuyambira pano mpaka kutsogolo, pan'dzawoneka axanu pa banja libodzi wakugawana anango kuwenga andzawo: Atatu kuwenga awiri ndipo awiri kuwenga atatu.
Ndipo an'dzakhala wakupambulana baba kuwenga mwana ndipo mwana kuwenga baba, mai kuwenga mwana wacikazi ndipo mwana wacikaziyo kuwenga mai, Mibzala kuwenga mulowola ndipo mulowola kuwenga mibzala”.
Ndipo Jezu adauuza mthithi ule pomwe kuti: “Imwepo mukawona m'tambo ulikukwira ucicokera kumadokero, pamwepo mumbalewa kuti: ‘Kun'bvumba’. Ndipo bzimbacitika.
Ndipo condzi cikamenya kucokera kunyantsi, imwepo mumbalewa kuti: ‘Lero kunipsa’, tenepoyo kumbapsa.
Wacipha-maso! Imwepo mumbadziwa kufotokoza makhalidwe ya pantsi na kudzulu. Mun'taza tani kudziwa kufotokoza bzinthu bzomwe bziri kucitika nthawe ino?”
“Thangwe ranyi imwepo mumbasaya kuzindikira mwekha bzomwe ni bzakulungama?

Winango wa imwe akakhala kuti alikuyenda na nyamadulanthaka wace kumphala, mbacite ciri-centse kuti abverane mulanduyo umale munjiramo. Kucitira kuti nyamaduranthakayo aleke kukaufikisa kuna mkulu wa mphambvu za umangi, ndipo mkuluyo acikaupereka kuna m'tongi wa milandu ndipo mtongiyo acikamufungira m'kawoko.
Ine ndirikukuuza kuti, iwepo un'dzacoka lini m'kawokomo ukanati kumala kulipira”.
Panthawe imweire, anango wa omwe akhali pompale adauza Jezu kuti Pirato adasanganiza mulopa wa aGalireya anango na ntsembe zawo.
Jezu adawatawira kuti: “Imwepo munikumbuka kuti aGalireyawo akhali atazi kwene-kwene kuposa andzawo, kuti abonere tenepoyo?
Ine nin'kuuzani kuti ndibzo lini! Tsono mukasaya kukhumbula, imwepo mwentse mun'dzadzongedwambo.
Ayai imwepo mun'kumbuka kuti khumi na asere (18) wale omwe adafa, mwa kugweredwa na nyumba itali ya Silowe, akhali atazi kwene-kwene kuposa wanthu wentse anango wakukhala muJerusalema?
Ine ninkuuzani kuti ndibzo lini! Tsono mukasaya kukhumbula, imwepo mwentse mun'dzadzongedwambo”.
Ndipo Jezu adawauza mfananizo wakuti: “Munthu m'bodzi akhadabzala mkuyu m'munda mwace mwa uva. Adayenda kuti akache bzisapo, ndipo alibe kuwona na cibodzico.

Na tenepo adauza omwe akhambanyang'anira mundayo kuti: ‘Yakwana magole matatu yomwe ndimbabwera kudzanyang'ana bzisapo mumkuyumu tsono nimbabziwona lini. Ugwate! Thangwe ranyi ulikufunga mbuto palibe basa?’
“Munthu ule adatawira kuti: ‘Mbuya, ulekeni, gole lino libodzi lokha, ndipo ine nin'dzaucerera-cerera m'bali mwa wene ndipo nin'dzauikha manyowa.
Ukadzabala bzisapo gole lin'bwera, ni bzabwino! Ukadzasaya kubala, udzaugwate’”.
Ntsiku inango ya sabudu Jezu akhapfundzisa m'nyumba inango ya mipembo.
Ndipo m'mwemo mukhana mkazi omwe akhana mzimu wakuipa omwe ukhamudwalisa mumagole khumi na masere (18). Iye akhafamba adakotama ndipo akhakwanisa lini kuthamula na pang'onopo.
Pomwe Jezu adamuwona, adamucemera kutsogolo acimuuza kuti: “Mkaziwe! Iwepo watsudzuka pamatenda yako”.
Pamwepo adam'sanjika manja. Ndipo nthawe imweyo letu iye adathamuka, ndipo adapasa mbiri Mulungu.

Tsono mkulu wa nyumba ya kupemba adakalipa pomwe adawona kuti Jezu walimbisa munthu pantsiku ya sabudu ndipo adauza mbumba kuti: “Pana ntsiku zitanthatu zomwe zin'funika kuphata basa. Bwerani kuti mudzalimbisidwe pantsiku zimwezo, tsono sikuti ntsiku ya sabudu”.
Tsono Mbuya adamutawira kuti: “Wacipha-masomwe! Kodi m'bodzi na m'bodzi wa imwe ambatsudzula lini mwakudyera ng'ombe yace ayai bulu pantsiku ya Sabudu kuti akamwesa madzi?
Tsono mkaziyu, mwana wa Abrahamu omwe Sathani akhadamangirira mumagole khumi na masere (18), bzikhali lini bwino kuti atsudzuliwe pantsiku ya Sabudu?”
Pomwe iye adamala kulewa bzimwebzo anyakumuwenga wentse adanyala, tsono mbumba ikhakondwa na bzidabwiso bzentse bzomwe Jezu akhacita.
Pamwepo Jezu adawabvundza kuti: “Umambo bwa Mulungu bumbawoneka ninga ciyani? Ningadzabulinganize na ciyani?
Budakhala ninga njere ya m'towe yomwe munthu adabzala m'munda mwace. Iyo idakula icikhala cimuti, ndipo mbalame zidakondza bzitsa m'mithawi mwawene”.
Iye adawabvundza pomwe kuti: “Umambo bwa Mulungu nin'dzabulinganiza na ciyani?
Budakhala ninga cakufufumisa comwe mkazi m'bodzi adasanganiza na ufa buzinji, ndipo bzakumunyabzo bzidafufumisidwa”.
Patsogolo pace, Jezu akhapita m'mizinda na m'mii acimbapfundzisa, akhayenda mphimpha ya kuJerusalema.
Munthu winango adam'bvunza kuti: “Mbuya, kodi an'dzapulumusidwa ni ang'ono-ng'ono?” Iye adamutawira kuti:
“Limbikani kuti mupite na pamsuwo wakupsindiza, nakuti Ine nin'kuuzani kuti azinji an'dzayezera kupita ndipo an'dzakwanisa lini.
Mwenekaciro wa nyumba akalamuka acifunga msuwo, imwepo mudzakhala cipande ca kunja, mucimbamenya mucimbakumbira kuti: ‘Mbuya, tifungulireni msuwo’.
“Iye pamwepo, an'dzatawira kuti: ‘Nin'kudziwani lini, napo kukudziwani kuti ndimwe wa kuponi’.
“Na tenepo imwepo mun'dzalewa kuti: ‘Timbadya na kumwa namwe, ndipo mudapfundzisa muzinjira zathu’.
“Tsono Iye an'dzakutawirani kuti: ‘Nin'kudziwani lini, napo kudziwa kuti ndimwe wa kuponi. Cokani kuna Ine, mwentsene omwe mumbacita bzakuipa!’
“Pamwepo pan'dzawoneka kulira na kukukuta mano, pomwe mukadzawona Abrahamu, Izaki, Jakobo na apolofita wentse ali muUmambo bwa Mulungu, tsono imwepo mun'dzathusidwa kunja.
Wanthu an'dzabwera kucokera kumabva-dzuwa na kumadokero, kucitunthu na kunyantsi an'dzakhala m'mipando mwawo pa meza muUmambo bwa Mulungu.
Cadidi, pana wakumalizira omwe an'dzakhala wakuyamba ndipo wakuyamba omwe an'dzakhala wakumalizira”.
Panthawe imweyo-letu, aFalizi anango adafendera kuna Jezu ndipo adamuwuza kuti: “Coka pano! Thangwe Herodi an'funa kukupha”.
Ndipo Iye adawatawira aciti: “Ndokoni mukamuuze kalinkhooyo kuti: Nin'dzathotha mizimu yakuipa ndipo ndinirimbisa mbumba lero na mangwana ndipo pantsiku yacitatu nin'dzamaliza basa langu.
Tsono, nin'funa kupitiriza ulendo bwangu lero, mangwana na mkuca, nakuti palibe mpolofita na m'bodziyo an'funika kuti afere kunja kwa Jerusalema!

“Jerusalema, Jerusalema, iwepo omwe umbapha apolofita ndipo umbathusira minyala omwe ambatumidwa kuna iwe! Ni kangasi kentse komwe ine ndikhafuna kugumanisa wana wako, ninga momwe nkhuku imbagumanizira wana wace mumaphapidwe mwace, tsono imwepo mulibe kubvuma!
Cadidi nyumba yanu in'dzakhala iribe munthu. Ine ndirikukuuzani kuti mun'dzandiwona lini pomwe mpaka imwepo mudzalewe kuti: ‘Wakusimbidwa ni ule omwe ali kubwera mudzina la Mbuya’
Pantsiku inango ya sabudu, Jezu adapita munyumba mwa m'kulu winango wa aFalizi kuti akadye, ndipo wanthu akhamunyang'anisisa.
Patsogolo pa Jezu pakhana munthu m'bodzi omwe akhana matenda yakugwera thupi.
Ndipo Jezu adabvundza adziwi wa Mtemo na aFalizi kuti: “Kodi ni bzakubvumizidwa ayai nee kulimbisa munthu paSabudu?”
Tsono iwo alibe kutawira. Tenepoyo, Jezu adamphata boko munthu ule acimulimbisa ndipo adamuuza kuti ayende.
Pamwepo Iye adawabvundza kuti: “M'bodzi wa imwe acikhala ana mwana ayai ana ng'ombe ndipo icigwera mudindi pantsiku ya Sabudu, angaleke kukaicosa?”
Ndipo iwo alibe kutawira cinthu.
Ndipo Jezu pomwe adawona momwe akhasankhulira mbuto zakulemekezeka pa meza wanthu wakucemeredwa, Iye adawauza mufananizo wakuti:
“Penu munthu winango an'kucemera pacikondweso ca malowozi, leka kusankhula mpando wakulemekezeka. Nakuti pan'dzakhala kuti pacemeredwa munthu wakulemekezedwa kuposa iwepo.
Ndipo ule omwe akucemerani an'dzakuuza kuti: ‘Mpando umweyu pasa uyu’. Ndipo iwepo na manyazi un'dzakakhala pampando wakumalizira.

Tsono iwepo ukacemeredwa, ndoko ukakhale pampando wakunyozeka. Kucitira kuti wakukucemerayo akabwera cite kudzakuuza kuti: ‘Xamwali, ndoko ukakhale pampando wakulemezeka ule’. Ndipo iwepo un'dzalemekezeka pakati pa alendo wentsenewo.
“Thangwe munthu ali-wentse omwe an'bzitumbiza, iye an'dzacepesedwa, ndipo omwe an'bzicepesa an'dzakuzidwa”.

Pamwepo Jezu adauza omwe akhadamucemerayo kuti: “Iwepo ukakondza cakudya ca masikati ayai ca kulalira, leka kucemera axamwali wako, abale ayai adzindza wako, napo wapafupi wako wakudala. Ukacita bzimwebzi, bzinifunika kuti iwo acitembo acikucemerambo ndipo tenepoyo iwepo an'dzakhala wabwezeredwa.
Tsono ukakondza cakudya, cemera wakusauka, wakulemala, wakupunduka na azimola.
Ndipo iwepo un'dzakhala wakupfatsa thangwe iwo alibe cinthu cakudzakubwezera. Mabaibai yako yan'dzabwera panthawe yomwe wanthu wakulungama an'dzamuka kwa wakufa”.
Munthu m'bodzi omwe akhali pameza na Jezu, pomwe adabva bzimwebzo adati: “Wakusimbidwa ni ule omwe an'dzadya pau muUmambo bwa Mulungu”.
Jezu adatawira kuti: “Munthu m'bodzi adacita cikondwereso cikulu kwene-kwene ndipo adacemera wanthu azinji.
Nthawe yatakwana yakudya adatuma nyagrinya wace kuti akauze omwe akhadacemeredwa kuti: ‘Bwerani, nakuti bzentse bzakondzeka’.
“Tsono iwo, m'bodzi na m'bodzi adayamba kuwonesa mathangwe. Wakuyamba adati: ‘Ndagula munda tsapanopa, nin'funa kukauwona. Ndaphata minyendo ndilekerereni’.
“Ndipo winango adati: ‘Ndagula bzipani bzixanu bza ng'ombe ndipo ndirikuyenda kukaziyezera. Ndaphata minyendo ndilekerereni’.
“Ndipo winango adati: ‘Ndalowola tsapanopa, na tenepo ndiniyende lini’.

“Nyagrinya ule adabwerera ndipo adalewa bzimwebzo kuna mbuya wace. Pamwepo mwenekaciro wa nyumba adakalipa ndipo adauza nyagirinya waceyo kuti: ‘Ndoko mwakumkulumize m'miseu na m'tunjira twa m'mzinda ndipo bweresa wakusauka, wakulemala, azimola na wakupunduka’.
“Nyagrinyayo adalewa kuti: ‘Bzomwe mbuya mwandiuza bzacitika, ndipo mbuto ikalipo’.
“Pamwepo mbuya adauza nyagrinya wace kuti: ‘Ndoko mumiseu na m'tunjira ndipo waumirize kuti apite, nyumba yangu idzadzale.
Ine nin'kuuzani kuti: Palibe na m'bodziyo pa wale omwe adacemeredwa an'dzalawidza cikondwereso cangu’”.
Ndipo mthithi ukulu ukhatewera Jezu. Iye pomwe adazungunuka kuna mthithi adati:

“Penu winango an'nditewera acikhala na lufoi na baba wace, na mai wace, na mkazi wace, na wana wace, na abale wace wacimuna na wacikazi, napo moyo wace caiwo kuposa Ine, angakhale lini muteweri wangu.
Ndipo ule omwe aninyamula lini m'tanda wace acisaya kunditewera angakhale lini mteweri wangu.
“Mbani wa imwe, omwe akafuna kumanga cinyumba cace citali, ambayamba lini kukhala pantsi acicita citalo ca ntsengwa, kuti awone penu ana kobiri yakukwana kumaliza kumangako?
Thangwe akaikha majomicomi ndipo akataza kucimaliza, wentse omwe aniciwona an'dzamuseka,
acimbati: ‘Munthu umweyu, adayamba kumanga ndipo alibe kukwanisa kucimaliza’.

“Ayai ni mambo mponi akafuna kucoka kukacita nkhondo na mambo winango, ambasaya kutoma wakhala pantsi acikumbuka kuti na amuna bzulu khumi an'kakwanisa kukamenyana na ule omwe ana bzulu makumi mawiri?
Penu an'kwanisa lini, iye an'tumiza kamangu aimikiri kuna mwandzaceyo akali patali ndipo an'kamukumbira cibverano ca mtendere.
Ni bzibodzi-bodzi, ali-yentse wa imwe omwe an'siya lini bzentse bzomwe anabzo, angakhale lini mteweri wangu.
“Munyu ni wabwino, tsono iwo ukamala goso, ungabwezeredwe tani goso?
Un'phata lini pomwe basa napo m'munda napo kuucita manyowa. Umbataidwa kuthengo.
“Ule omwe ana makutu yakubva, abve”.
Ndipo wanthu wakupimisa mtsonkho na wanthu wakucemeredwa atazi adakhoncezana kuti adzabve Jezu.
Tsono aFalizi na amisiri wa Mtemo akhang'ung'udzika acimbati: “Munthu umweyu ambatambira atazi acidya nawo pabodzi”.
Pamwepo Jezu adawacitira mfananizo wakuti:
“Kodi mbani wa imwe, acikhala na mabira dzana, ndipo bira m'bodzi acitaika, angasiye lini makumi mapfemba na mapfemba mutsala ndipo acitewera bira wataikayo mpaka kumugumana?
Ndipo akamugumana, ambam'kupika paphewa mwakukomedwa
aciyenda kumui. Akafika, an'cemera axamwali wace na wapafupi aciwauza kuti: ‘Komedwani pabodzi na ine, nakuti bira wangu omwe akhadataika ndamugumana’.

Ine nin'kuuzani kuti, ni bzibodzi-bodzi, kudzulu kun'dzawoneka kukondwa kwene-kwene thangwe ra mtazi m'bodzi omwe anikhumbula kuposa makumi mapfemba na apfemba wakulungama omwe an'funika lini kuti akhumbule”.
“Ayai, kodi ni mkazi muponi omwe angakhale na kobiri khumi za ndzayaya, icitaika ibodzi, angasaye kugasa m'bvuniko acipsaira munyumbamo ndipo aciinyang'ana bwino-bwino mpaka kuiwona?
Ndipo akaiwona, ambacemera axamwali na wapafupi wace aciwauza kuti: ‘Komedwani pabodzi na ine, nakuti kobiri yangu yomwe ikhadataika ndaiwona’.
Ine nin'kuuzani kuti, ni bzibodzi-bodzi pan'dzakhala na kukomedwa pamaso pa anju wa Mulungu thangwe ra mtazi m'bodzi omwe an'khumbula”.
Jezu adapitiriza kulewa aciti: “Munthu m'bodzi akhana wana wace awiri.
Ndipo m'ng'ono adauza baba wace kuti: ‘Baba, nin'funa cipande cangu ca utaka’. Tenepoyo iye adagawa utakabo bwace kuna iwo.
“Zatapita ntsiku zing'ono-ng'ono, mwana m'ng'onoyo adalongedza bzentse bzomwe akhanabzo, ndipo adayenda kudziko la patali. Ndipo kumweko adakadzonga bzinthu bzace bzentse na khalidwe lace lakuipa.
Watamala kudzonga bzentse, kudziko lire kudawoneka njala ikulu kwene-kwene, ndipo iye adayamba kubonera.
Na tenepo, iye adayenda kukanyang'ana basa kuna munthu m'bodzi wa mudzikomo, ndipo iye adamuyendesa kumunda kwace kuti akazikhongobze nkhumba.
Iye akhandofuna kudzaza mimba yace na bzomwe bzikhadya nkhumbabzo, tsono palibe omwe akhamupasa cinthu.
“Pamwepo ndzeru zace zidabwerera acikumbuka kuti: ‘Ni wabasa angasi omwe baba wangu anawo ambadya bzicisala, ndipo ine kuno ndicifa na njala!
Ine ndiniyenda kuna baba wangu, ndipo ndin'kamuuza kuti: Baba, ndaphonyera kudzulu na imwepo.
Nin'themera lini pomwe kucemeredwa mwana wanu. Ndiyeseni ninga m'bodzi wa wabasa wanu’.
Patsogolo pace, adaphata njira aciyenda kuna baba wace.
“Pomwe iye akhabwera, baba wace adamuwona na kutali ndipo adadzala na ntsisi, acithamanga kuna mwana wace, ndipo adamukolombexa acimumpsompsona.
“Pamwepo mwanayo adalewa kuti: ‘Baba, ndaphonyera kudzulu na imwepo. Nin'themera lini pomwe kucemeredwa mwana wanu’.
“Tsono baba wace adauza wabasa kuti: ‘Kulumizani! Bweresani bzakubvala bzabwino ndipo mubvazikeni. Muikheni mphete kucala cace na xangu minyendo mwace.
Ndipo phatani kamkono kakunenepa muphe. Tikondze phwandu tikondwere.
Nakuti mwananguyu akhadafa ndipo iye wamuka pomwe. Akhadataika tsono wagumanidwa’. Ndipo iwo adayamba kukondwera thangwe ra kubwerera kwace.
“Pomwe bzikhacitika bzimwebzi, mwana wace mkulu akhali kumunda. Pomwe iye akhafendera pafupi na pamuipo adabva nyimbo na wanthu akhambabzina.
Pamwepo adacemera wabasa m'bodzi acim'bvundza kuti ni ciyani cikhacitika.
Iye adamutawira kuti: ‘M'bale wako wabwerera, ndipo baba wako wapha kamkono kakunenepa, thangwe iye wabwerera adalimba ndipo na moyo’.
“Mwana mkuluyo adadzala na ukali, ndipo akhafuna lini kupita. Pamwepo baba wace adabula panja ndipo adamuumiriza.

Tsono iye adam'tawira baba wace kuti: ‘Wonani, magole yentseneya nimbaphata basa ninga nyagirinya pabasa lanu ndipo ndikanati kusaya kukubverani bzomwe munindiuza. Tsono imwepo mukanati kundipasa nee mbuzi ibodzi yokha kuti ndikondze phwandu na axamwali wangu.
Tsono pomwe mwana wanuyu abwerera kumui, omwe adadzonga bzinthu bzanu na maputa, imwepo mwamuphera kamkono kakunenepa!’
“Baba wace adati: ‘Mwana wangu, Iwepo uli na ine nthawe zentse, ndipo bzinthu bzangu bzentse ni bzako.
Tsono ife tikhafunika kuti ticite phwandu ra kubwerera kwa m'bale wakoyu ndipo tikomedwe, thangwe iye akhadafa wamuka pomwe, ndipo akhadataika wagumanidwa’”.
Jezu adauza ateweri wace kuti: “Msunga-cuma wa munthu m'bodzi wakudala, adapasidwa mulandu wakuti akhamudzongera bzinthu bzace.

Ndipo iye adamucemeresa acim'bvundza kuti: ‘Ni ciyani cimweci comwe ndirikubva bza cipande cako? Ndipasire m'dandanda wa basa lako la msunga-cuma, thangwe iwepo un'pitiriza lini pomwe kukhala msunga-cuma’”.
“Msunga-cuma ule adakumbuka kuti: ‘Mbuya wangu alikundicosa. Nin'cita ciyani? Nakuti ine kulima nin'kwanisa lini, ndipo ndina manyazi ya kumbafamba ndicikumbira.
Ndin'dziwa bzomwe nditi ndicite, kuti ndikacosedwa pabasa langu pano, wanthu anditambire m'manyumba mwawo’”.
“Pamwepo iye adacemera m'bodzi na m'bodzi wa wanthu omwe akhana mangawa na mbuya wace. Ndipo adabvundza wakuyamba kuti: ‘Iwepo una mangawa ya kobiri zingasi kuna mbuya wangu?’
Iye adamutawira kuti: ‘Migolo dzana ya mafuta ya oliva’”. “Msunga-cuma adamuuza kuti: ‘Tambira tsamba lako khala mwakamkulumize ndipo nemba makumi maxanu (50)’”.

“Patsogolo pace adabvundza waciwiri kuti: ‘Iwepo uli naye mangawa ya tani?’ Ndipo iye adatawira kuti: ‘Masakha dzana ya tirigu’”. “Ndipo iye adamuuza kuti: ‘Tambira tsamba lako la mangawa ndipo nemba makumi masere (80)’.
“Ndipo mbuya ule adamutenda msunga-cuma wakusaya kukhulupirika ule thangwe adabzicita na kucenjera. Nakuti wana wa dziko lino ni wakucenjera kwene-kwene kuposa wana wa ceza.
Na tenepo, ine nin'kuuzani kuti: Phatisani basa udali bwa dziko lino lakuipa kuti mukhale na axamwali, mwakuti udalibo bukadzamala mudzatambiridwe bwino kumbuto zakukhala kwakusaya kumala”.
“Omwe ni wakukhulupirika pa bzing'ono-ng'ono, ni wakukhulupirikambo pa bzizinji, ndipo omwe ni wakusaya kulungama pa bzing'ono-ng'ono, ni wakusaya kulungamambo pa bzizinji.
Tenepoyo, imwepo mukasaya kukhala wakukhulupirika pakuphatisa basa udali bwa dziko lino lakuipa, mbani an'dzakukhulupirirani pa udali bwacadidi?
Ndipo imwepo mukasaya kukhulupirika pa bzinthu bza anango, mbani an'dzakupasani bzomwe ni bzanu?

“Palibe wabasa omwe angatumikire azimbuya awiri. Nakuti angawenge m'bodzi acibverana na munangoyo, ayai an'dzatumikira m'bodzi acinyoza munangoyo. Bzingacitike lini imwepo kutumikira Mulungu ndipo mucitumikira kobiri”.
AFalizi omwe akhafuna kobiri, akhabva bzentsenebzo ndipo akhambanyaza Jezu.

Ndipo iye adawauza kuti: “Imwepo ndimwe omwe mumbabziyesa kuti ndimwe wakulungama pamaso pa wanthu, tsono Mulungu ambadziwa mitima yanu. Cinthu comwe ni cakufunika kwene-kwene pakati pa wanthu ni cakunyantsa pamaso pa Mulungu”.

“Mtemo na bzomwe adanemba Apolofita bzidaphata basa mpaka thawe ya Juwau m'batizi. Panthawe imweyo kuyenda kutsogolo yalikupalizidwa mafala yabwino ya Umambo bwa Mulungu, ndipo wentse alikuyezera kucita mphambvu kuti apite muUmambobo.
Ni bzakupusa kunyembereka kudzulu na pantsi kuposa kugwa kwa kadutswa ka Mtemo”.
“Omwe anilamba mkazi wace acikalowola mkazi winango wacita upombo, ndipo mwamuna omwe anilowola mkazi omwe adalambidwa wacita upombo”.
“Pakhana munthu m'bodzi nyakudala omwe akhabvala nguwo zabwino ndipo zakobiri zizinji ntsiku zentse akhakhala pabwino.
Ndipo patsogolo pa msuwo wace pakhana wakukumbira-kumbira m'bodzi dzina lace Lazalo, iye akhadadzala na bzilonda m'thupi.
Iye akhambafuna kudya tumbvululu tomwe tukhagwa pa meza ya nyakudala. Napombo bwaya zikhabwera kudzamunyanguta bzironda”.
“Idafika ntsiku yakuti wakukumbira-kumbira ule idafa, ndipo anju adamutenga aciyenda kukakhala pabodzi na Abrahamu. Ndipo wakudala ule adafambo acikapendesedwa.
Mudindi la moto momwe akhaboneresedwa, iye adanyang'ana kudzulu adawona Abrahamu patali, na Lazalo pambali pa iye.

Pamwepo, adamucemera adati: ‘Baba Abrahamu, ndibvereni ntsisi ndipo tumani Lazalo kuti akatibzike ntsonga ya cala cace m'madzi kuti adzajejerese lirime langu, thangwe ndirikubonera kwene-kwene na motoyu’”.

“Tsono Abrahamu adatawira kuti: ‘Mwana wangu, ulikukumbuka kuti pomwe ukhana moyo iwepo udatambira bzinthu bzabwino, ndipo Lazalo adatambira bzinthu bzakuipa. Tsapano lino, iye ali kutsangalazidwa kuno, ndipo iwepo uli kwakubonera.

Ndipombo, pakati pa imwe na ife pana cigwindza cakuzika kwene-kwene, mwakuti wale omwe an'funa kucoka kumbali ya ife acibwera kuna imwe, ayai kucoka kumbali ya imwe acibwera kuna ife, an'kwanisa lini’”.
“Iye adatawira kuti: ‘Na tenepoyo, ine ndirikukukumbirani Baba kuti tumani Lazalo ayende kunyumba kwa baba wangu,
nakuti ndina abale wangu axanu. Ndipo mulekeni akawacenjeze, kuti iwo asaye kubwerambo kumbuto ya kubonera ino’”.
“Ndipo Abrahamu adamutawira kuti: ‘Iwo ana Mozeji na Apolofita. Awabvere amwewo’”.
Iye adati: “‘Ni tenepoyo lini Baba Abrahamu, tsono m'bodzi pakati pa wakufa angadayenda mpaka kumweko, iwo angadakhumbula’”.
“Tsono Abrahamu adamutawira adati: ‘Iwo akasaya kubvera Mozeji na Apolofita, napang'onopo an'dzakwanisika lini, napo winango pakati pa wakufa acilamuka’”.
Jezu adauza ateweri wace kuti: “Bzin'kwanisika lini kupingiza bzinthu bzomwe bzin'dzacitisa mbumba kuti iphonyeke, tsono tsoka kuna munthu omwe an'dzacitisa kuti bzimwebzo bzicitike.
Bzikhali bwino kuti munthuyo amangiriridwe mwala wa thumba m'khosi acikathusidwa pakati pa nyandza, kuposa kucitisa kuti m'bodzi wa tuwanatu acite citazo.
Cenjerani.
“Penu m'bale wako an'cita citazo, mutsimule, ndipo penu iye an'khumbula, mulekerere.
Penu an'cita citazo kuna iwepo kanomwe pantsiku ndipo acibwera kuna iwe kanomwe acilewa kuti: ‘Ndakhumbula’, mulekerere”.
Pamwepo atumiki adakumbira kuna Mbuya aciti: “Tithumizireni cikhulupiro cathu!”
Iye adawatawira aciti: “Penu imwepo muna cikhulupiro ninga njere ya mtowe, mungadauza mutiyu kuti: ‘Zuka ukabzizike panyandza’, Ndipo iwo un'dzakubvera.
“Mbani wa imwe omwe angakhale na wabasa wace m'bodzi, omwe angakhale kuti alikulima ayai alikuusa mabira, akafika kucokera kumatsala kodi ungamuuze kuti: ‘Bwera tsapanopa khala udye’?
Unimuza lini terepoyo nee, koma unimuuza kuti: ‘Kondza cakudya ca kulalira, kondzeka ndipo unditumikire ndidye na kumwa. Patsogolo pace iwepo ungadye na kumwa’?
Kodi iye angamutende wabasa thangwe ra kucita bzomwe wamuuza?
Na tenepo imwepombo, mukadzamala kucita bzentse bzomwe mungauzidwe, lewani kuti: ‘Ndife wabasa wapezi-pezi. Tsono tidacita bzire basi bzomwe tidathemera kuti ticite’”.
Jezu pomwe akhafamba kuyenda kuJerusalema, adapita na m'malire mwa cigawo ca Samaliya na Galireya.
Pomwe iye adafika m'mui winango, wamapere khumi adayenda kuna Iye. Ndipo iwo adaima patali.
Ndipo adakuwa kwene-kwene aciti: “Nandi Misiri, Jezu, tibverenimbo ntsisi!”
Pomwe iye adawawona, adawauza kuti: “Ndokoni mukabzilatize kuna azibaba wa ntsembe”. Pomwe iwo akhayendapo, mapere yawo yadamala.
M'bodzi wa iwo pomwe adawona kuti wapola, adabwerera acimbapasa mbiri Mulungu na kukuwa.
Iye adagodama m'minyendo mwa Jezu ndipo adamutenda. Umweule akhali munthu wa cigawo ca Samaliya.
Ndipo Jezu adabvundza kuti: “Kodi mulibe kupolesedwa mwentse khumi? Kodi anango apfemba ayenda kuponi?
Palibe kuwoneka omwe adabwerera acitumbiza Mulungu, kupambula wakudza ule?”
Pamwepo Iye adamuuza kuti: “Imirira ndoko, cikhulupiro cako cakupulumusa”.
Ntsiku inango, Jezu adabvundzidwa na aFalizi kuti ni lini bun'dzafika Umambo bwa Mulungu. Jezu adatawira kuti: “Umambo bwa Mulungu bun'bwera lini mwakuwoneka na maso,
napo kudzalewedwa kuti: ‘Ubu buli pano’ ayai ‘Ubo buli uko’, thangwe Umambo bwa Mulungu buli pakati panu”.
Patsogolo pace, adauza ateweri wace kuti: “In'dzakwana nthawe yomwe imwepo mun'dzafuna kuwona ntsiku ibodzi ya Mwana wa Munthu, tsono mun'dzaiwona lini.
An'dzakuuzani imwepo kuti: ‘Iye ali uko’, ayai ‘Ali pano’. Lekani kudzakulumiza kuwatewera.
Nakuti Mwana wa Munthu ntsiku yace in'dzabwera ninga mpheni mwakuti kuyetima kwace kumbayenda phampha na phampha la kudzulu.
Tsono bzikanati kucitika, bzin'funika kuti Iye abonere kwene-kwene ndipo alambidwe na m'badwe uno.
“Tenepayu momwe bzidacitira panthawe za Nowa, bzin'dzacitikambo panthawe yomwe Mwana wa Munthu an'dzabwera.
Mbumba ikhambakhala icidya, icimbamwa, icimbalowozana na kumbalowodwa, mpaka ntsiku yomwe Nowa adapita muarka. Pamwepo kudawoneka cigumula ca madzi, ndipo cidapha wanthu wentse.
“Bzibodzi-bodzibzo bzidawoneka pomwe panthawe ya Loti. Mbumba ikhadya, icimwa, ikhagula na kugulisa, ikhabzala na kumbamanga nyumba.
Tsono pantsiku yomwe Loti adacoka muSodoma, kudabvumba moto ndipo minyala ya enxofre ya kucokera kudzulu idapha wentse.
“Tenepoyo bzin'dzacitikambo, pantsiku yomwe Mwana wa Munthu an'dzawonesedwa.

Pantsiku imweyo ule omwe an'dzakhala ali pantsodzi penu ana bzinthu bzace m'nyumba, an'dzaleke kubuluka kuti adzabzitenge bzinthu bzace m'nyumba. Bzibodzi-bodzimbo, ule omwe an'dzakhala ali kumunda, adzaleke kubwerera kumbuyo thangwe ra cinthu ciri-centse.
Kumbukirani mkazi wa Loti!
Omwe an'funa kukoya moyo wace an'dzautaya, ndipo omwe an'dzataya moyo wace an'dzaupulumusa.
Ine nin'kuuzani: Usiku bumwebo wanthu awiri an'dzakhala adagona pamphasa ibodzi. M'bodzi an'dzacosedwa ndipo winango an'dzasala.
Akazi awiri an'dzakhala ali kupeya pabodzi, m'bodzi an'dzatengedwa winango an'dzasala.
Wanthu awiri an'dzakhala ali kumunda, m'bodzi an'dzacosedwa, ndipo winango an'dzasala”
Iwo adamubvundza kuti: “Kodi bzimwebzi bzin'dzacitira kuponi Mbuya?”.
Ndipo Iye adawatawira kuti: “Komwe kungadzawoneke citanda, pamwepo pan'dzakoncezana magola”.
Ndipo Jezu adafotokozera ateweri wace mfananizo, wakuwawonesa kuti bzikhafunika iwo kumbapemba nthawe zentse mwakusaya kuleka.
Iye adati: “Mumzinda winango mukhana mtongi m'bodzi omwe akhagopa lini Mulungu napo kulemekeza munthu.
Ndipo mumzindamo mukhana masiwa m'bodzi omwe akhambayenda ntsiku zentse kuna iye, acimbakam'kumbira kuti: ‘Nditongeni mwa cirungamo mulandu omwe uli pakati pangu na nyamadulanthaka wangu’.
“Ndipo mtongiyo akhabvuma lini kumtonga kwa nthawe itali. Tsono pakumalizira adadzakumbuka yekha kuti: ‘Napo ine nimbagopa lini Mulungu ngakhale kulemekeza munthu ali-yentse,
tsono mansiwa umweyu alikundinesa. Ndinimutonga mwa cirungamo kuti iye aleke kubwera pomwe kudzandinesa’”.
Ndipo Mbuya adapitiriza kulewa aciti: “Bvani bzomwe alikulewa mtongi wakusaya kulungama.
Kodi Mulungu angadzalekembo kucita cirungamo kuna wakusankhulidwa wace, omwe ambamudandaulira masikati na usiku? Kodi iye angadzacedwe kuwathandiza?
Ine nin' kuuzani kuti Iye an'dzawatonga mwa cirungamo ndipo mwakankulumize. Tsono, kodi pomwe Mwana wa Munthu an'dzabwera, an'dzagumana cikhulupiro pantsi pano?”
Jezu adalewa pomwe mfananizo kuna wale omwe akhabziyesa wakulungama na kumbanyoza andzawo. Iye adati:
“Amuna awiri adayenda muNyumba ya Mulungu kuti akapembe. M'bodzi akhali muFalizi ndipo winangoyo akhali wakupimisa mtsonkho.

Ndipo muFaliziyo akhadaima acimbabzipembera yekha kuti: ‘Mulungu, ine ndirikukutendani thangwe ndiribe kukhala ninga amuna anango, omwe ni mbava, wakusaya kulungama na waupombo, napo ninga wakupimisa mtsonkhoyu.
Nimbabzimana kudya kawiri pamdzinga, ndipo nimbapereka cakhumi ca bzinthu bzangu bzentse bzomwe nimbatambira’.
“Tsono wakupimisa mtsonkho ule akhadaima kutali, ndipo akhajiguma lini kudzulu, tsono akhambabzimenya pacifuwa, aciti: ‘Mulungu, ndibverenimbo ntsisi, nakuti ndine mtazi’.

“Ine nin'kuuzani kuti mwamuna umweyu, ndipo sikuti winangoyo, adabwerera kumui wakulungama patsogolo pa Mulungu. Nakuti ule omwe an'bzikuza, an'dzacepesedwa, ndipo ule omwe an'bzicepesa, an'dzakuzidwa”.
Ndipo mbumba ikhabweresambo wana kuti Jezu adzawakhuye. Pomwe ateweri wace adawona bzimwebzo adatsimula wale omwe akhadawabweresa.
Tsono Jezu adawacemera wanawo kuti abwere pana iye, ndipo adati:
“Alekeni wanawo abwere kuna Ine, lekani kuwaletsa. Nakuti Umambo bwa Mulungu ni bwa wale omwe adalingana na wanawa.
Nin'kuuzani cadidi kuti: Omwe an'saya kutambira Umambo bwa Mulungu ninga mwana, an'dzapita lini muUmambobo cipo”.
Ndipo munthu m'bodzi wakulemekezeka adabvundza Jezu kuti: “Misiri wabwino! Kodi ningacite tani kuti ndidzakhale na moyo wakusaya kumala?”
Jezu adamutawira kuti: “Kodi iwepo uli kundicemera kuti wabwino thangwe ranyi? Nakuti palibe munthu wabwino kuposa Mulungu yekha.
Iwepo umbaidziwa mitemo yomwe imbati: ‘Leka upombo, leka kupha, leka kuba, leka kucita umboni wakunama, lemekeza baba wako na mai wako’”.
Iye adatawira kuti: “Bzentsenebzi ndinimbabzicita kale kuyambira paubwana bwangu”.
Pomwe Jezu adabva bzimwebzo adamuuza kuti: “Casalira cinango cibodzi. Gulisa bzentse bzomwe unabzobzo, ndipo kobirizo ugawire wakusauka, ndipo un'dzakhala na cuma kudzulu. Patsogolo pace unditewere”.
Tsono, pomwe iye adabva bzimwebzo adadodoma, nakuti akhadadala kwene-kwene.
Jezu atawona kuti munthuyo wadodoma adati: “Ni bzakunesa kwene-kwene kuti wanthu wakudala adzapite muUmambo bwa Mulungu!
Nakuti bzidapusa kuti ngamira ipite pabuli la ntsingano kuposa munthu wakudala kukapita muUmambo bwa Mulungu”.
Ndipo wale omwe adabva mafala yamweyo adabvundza kuti: “Mbani tsono, omwe angadzapulumusidwe?”
Jezu adatawira kuti: “Comwe munthu an'kwanisa lini, Mulungu an'cikwanisa”.
Ndipo Pedru adati: “Ife tasiya bzentse bzomwe tikhanabzo kuti tikutewereni!”
Jezu adatawira aciti: “Nin'kuuzani cadidi kuti palibe omwe wasiya nyumba yace, mkazi wace, abale wace, baba wace, ayai wana wace, thangwe ra Umambo bwa Mulungu
an'dzasaya kutambira nthawe ino-letu, kazinji kentse, ndipombo nthawe yakutsogolo kuno, moyo wakusaya kumala”.
Jezu adacemera ateweri wace khumi na awiri pambali aciwauza kuti: “Tirikuyenda kuJerusalema, ndipo bzentse bzomwe bzidanembedwa na apolofita bza Mwana wa Munthu bziti bzicitike.
Iye aniperekedwa kuna wanthu wakusaya kupemba
, iwo an'kamunyaza, ankamutukwana, ankamupsipira mata, ankamukwapula ndipo acimupha.
Tsono pa kumala kwa ntsiku zitatu Iye an'dzalamuka”.
Ndipo ateweri wace alibe kubvesesa bzinthu bzimwebzi. Mafalayo bzomwe yakhalewa bzikhadabisika, ndipo iwo akhadziwa lini bzomwe Jezu akhalewa.
Pomwe Jezu adafika pafupi na mzinda wa Jeriko, mwamuna m'bodzi zimola akhadakhala m'mphepete mwa njira acimbakumbira-kumbira.
Pomwe iye adabva ciwowo ca mthithi wa wanthu omwe akhapita na njira, adabvundza kuti ni ciyani cikhacitika.
Adamuuza kuti: “Jezu wa kuNazareta alikupita”.
Pamwepo iye adayamba kukuwa adati: “Jezu, Mwana wa Davide, ndibverembo ntsisi!”
Ndipo wale omwe akhali kutsogolo adamunyamaliza kuti akhale zii. Tsono iye ndipo akhanyanyiratu kukuwa acimbati: “Nandi Mwana wa Davide, ndibverembo ntsisi!”
Pamwepo Jezu adaima aciwauza kuti amubweresere mwamunayo. Pomwe mwamuna ule adafika pafupi na Iye, Jezu adamubvundza kuti:
“Kodi un'funa kuti ndikucitire ciyani?”
Iye adatawira kuti: “Mbuya, ine nin'funa kuti ndiwone pomwe”.
Ndipo Jezu adamuuza kuti: “Wona! Cikhulupiro cako cakulimbisa”.
Panthawe imweyo-letu, iye adapenya, ndipo adatewera Jezu acimbakuza Mulungu. Pomwe mbumba yentse idawona bzimwebzo, idatumbiza Mulungu.
Ndipo Jezu adapita muJeriko acimbagwata na mumzinda.
Mumzindamo mukhana mwamuna m'bodzi wakudala akhacemeredwa Zakeu, mkulu wa wakupimisa mtsonkho.
Iye akhafuna kudziwa kuti Jezu mbani, tsono akhana msinkhu ung'ono, ndipo akhakwanisa lini kumuwona thangwe ra mthithi wa wanthu.
Tenepoyo, adathamanga kutsogolo ndipo adakwira mumkuyu kuti amuwone, nakuti Jezu akhayenda kukapita na pamwepo.
Pomwe Jezu adafika pambuto imweire, adanyang'ana m'dzulu ndipo adati: “Zakeu, buluka kamkulumize. Nin'funa kukakhala kunyumba kwako lero”.
Pamwepo iye adabuluka mwakamkulumize ndipo adamutambira na kukondwa.
Ndipo mbumba yentse yomwe idawona bzimwebzi idang'ung'udzika icimbati: “Iye wafikira kunyumba kwa mtazi
Tsono Zakeu adaima aciuza Mbuya kuti: “Bvani Mbuya, nin'pereka bzinthu bzangu bzentse pakati-na-kati kuna wakusauka. Ndipo penu ndidabera winango, nin'dzamubwezera kanai kentse”.
Ndipo Jezu adamuuza kuti: “Lero panyumba pano pafika cipulumuso! Thangwe mwamuna umweyumbo ni mwana wa Abrahamu.
Nakuti Mwana wa Munthu adabwera kudzalinga na kupulumusa comwe cikhadataika”.
Pomwe iwo akhamutetekera, Jezu adawauza mfananizo ubodzi, thangwe iwo akhali pafupi na Jerusalema ndipo mbumba ikhakumbuka kuti Umambo bwa Mulungu bungadawonekeratu pamwepo.
Jezu adawauza kuti: “Pakhana mwamuna m'bodzi wa mbiri adayenda kudziko la kutali, kuti akatambire umambo ndipo akakamala abwerere.
Pamwepo, adacemera wabasa wace khumi, ndipo adawapasa kobiri khumi zakucemeredwa mina aciwauza kuti: ‘Citani kuti kobiriyi ikhale na phindu mpaka kubwera kwangu’”.
“Tsono mbumba ya mudzikomo ikhamuwenga, ndipopo adatumiza aimikiri kuti akamuuze aciti: ‘Tin'funa lini kuti munthu umweyu akhale mambo wathu’”.
“Tsono iye adaikhidwa umambo ndipo adabwerera. Pamwepo adacemeresa wabasa wace omwe akhadapasa kobiri, kuti adziwe adaphindula zingasi”.
“Wakuyamba adabwera aciti: ‘Mbuya, kobiri yanu yaphindula zinango khumi’”.
Mbuya wace adatawira kuti: “Wacita bwino, wabasa wangu wabwino! Nakuti wakhala wakukhulupirika pa bzing'ono-ng'ono, tonga mizinda khumi”.
“Waciwiri adabwerambo adati: ‘Mbuya, kobiri yanu yaphindula zinango zixanu’”.
“Mbuya wace adamutawira kuti: ‘Iwepombo tonga mizinda mixanu’”.
“Pamwepo adabwerambo wabasa winango adati: ‘Mbuya, kobiri yanu iyi. Ine ndikhadaikoya, idamangirira papfundo pa nguwo.
Nakuti ndikhana mantha, thangwe ndimwe munthu wakunesa kwene-kwene. Mumbatenga comwe mulibe kuikha ndipo mumbabvuna bzomwe mulibe kubzala’”.

“Mbuya wace adatawira kuti: ‘Ine nin'dzakupasa mulandu na mafala yakoya, wabasa wakuipa! Iwepo ukhadziwa kuti ndine munthu wakunesa kwene-kwene, omwe ndimbatenga bzomwe ndiribe kuikha ndipo ndimbabvuna bzomwe ndiribe kubzala.
Tsono, ni thangwe ranyi ulibe kukakoya kobiri yangu kuthenthe lakukoyera kobiri? Tenepayu, ndabwererepa ndingadatambira na phindu’”.
“Ndipo adauza wale omwe akhali pamwepo, kuti: ‘Mutengereni kobiri yace pasani ule omwe ana kobiri khumi’”.
“Iwo adati ‘Mbuya iye anazo kale khumi!’”
“Iye adatawira kuti: ‘Ine nin'kuuzani kuti omwe anabzo, anipasidwa bzinango, tsono ule omwe alibe, napo bzomwe anabzo an'dzatengeredwa.
Ndipo anyamadulanthaka wangu wale, omwe akhafuna lini kutongedwa na ine, abwereseni pano ndipo muwaphe patsogolo pangu!’”.
Jezu pomwe adamala kulewa bzimwebzo, adatsogola paulendo bwace acimbakwira kuyenda kuJerusalema.
Pomwe adafika kufupi na mii ya Betifaje na Betanya, paphiri likhacemeredwa Phiri la Oliva, adatuma ateweri wace awiri adawauza kuti:
“Ndokoni pamui omwe uli kutsogoloyo, ndipo pakupita m'muimo mun'kawona kabulu kadamangirira, komwe palibe omwe adakapakira kale. Mukakatsudzule mucibwera nako kuno.
Penu winango an'kakubvundzani kuti: ‘Thangwe ranyi muli kukatsudzula?’ Kamuuzeni kuti: Mbuya alikukafuna”.
Ndipo wale omwe akhadatumidwa adayenda ndipo adakagumana kabulu kale ninga momwe akhadauzidwa.
Pomwe iwo akhatsudzula kabuluko, wenekaciro adawabvundza kuti: “Thangwe ranyi imwepo mulikukatsudzula kabuluka?”
Iwo adatawira kuti: “Mbuya alikukafuna”.
Iwo adakatenga aciyenda nako kuna Jezu, acitandika bzakubvala bzawo pakabulupo ndipo adathandiza Jezu kuti apakire.
Pomwe Iye akhambayenda mbumba ikhatandika bzakubvala bzawo munjira.
Pomwe akhali pafupi na phompho la phiri la Oliva, mthithi wentse wa ateweri adayamba kutumbiza Mulungu mwakukondwa, ndipo akhambakuwa, thangwe ra bzidabwiso bzentse bzomwe iwo adawona. Akhambati:
“Wakusimbidwa ni mambo omwe alikubwera
mudzina la Mbuya!”
“Mtendere kudzulu
ndipo mbiri kuna Mulungu!”
Ndipo aFalizi anango omwe akhali pakati pa mthithi wa wanthuwo adauza Jezu kuti: “Misiri, tsimulani ateweri wanu!”
Jezu adawatawira kuti: “Ine nin'kuuzani kuti, iwo akanyamala minyalayi in'dzakuwa”.
Pomwe Jezu akhafika pafupi aciwona mzinda wa Jerusalema, adaulirira mzindawo
ndipo adati: “Iwepo ungadadziwa lero kuti ni ciyani cingakupase mtendere! Tsono tsapano lino cidabisika ciniwoneka lini na maso yako.
Zirikubwera ntsiku zomwe anyamadulanthaka wako an'dzakucerera madindi, an'dzakuzungulira mbali zentse.
Ndipombo an'dzakudzonga pabodzi na wana wako padziko. An'dzasiya lini mwala padzulu pa undzace, thangwe imwepo mulibe kuzindikira mpata wa kuzungiridwa kwanu”.
Pamwepo Iye adapita m'Nyumba ya Mulungu ndipo adayamba kuthotha omwe akhacita malonda mkatimo.
Jezu adawauza kuti: “Bzidanembedwa kuti: ‘Nyumba yangu in'dzakhala nyumba ya kupembera’
Tsono imwepo mulikucita ‘nkhunde ya mbava’
Ndipo ntsiku zentse Jezu akhambapfundzisa m'Nyumba ya Mulungu. Tsono akulu-akulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe, adziwi wa Mtemo, na atsogoleri wa mbumba akhafuna kumupha.
Tsono iwo akhakwanisa lini kuwona mpata wakuti abzicite bzimwebzo, thangwe mbumba yentse yomwe akhamubva, ikhatengeka mitima na mafala yaceyo.
Pantsiku ibodzi pomwe Jezu akhapfundzisa wanthu na kumbapalidza Mafala yabwino m'Nyumba ya Mulungu, adafika akulu-akulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe na adziwi wa Mtemo na atsogoleri wa mbumba,
ndipo adamubvundza aciti: “Kodi wabvumizidwa na yani kuti ucite bzinthu bzimwebzi? Mbani wakubvumiza?”
Ndipo Iye adawatawira kuti: “Ine nin'kupasanimbo mbvundzo ubodzi. Ndiuzeni kuti:
Kodi ubatizo bwa Juwau ukhali bwa Mulungu ayai bwa wanthu?”
Ndipo iwo akhambabvundzana okha-okha acimbati: “Tikalewa kuti: Bukhali bwa Kudzulu, Iye andzatubvundza kuti: ‘Tsono thangwe ranyi mudasaya kum'tawira?’.
Tsono tikalewa kuti: Bukhali bwa wanthu, mbumba yentse in'dzatiboma na minyala, thangwe iwo akhadziwisisa kale kuti Juwau akhali mpolofita”.
Na tenepo iwo adatawira kuti: “Tinidziwa lini kuti bukhali bwa kuponi”.
Pamwepo Jezu adati: “Nin'kuzani lini na pang'onopo kuti mbani adandibvumiza kucita bzinthu bzimwebzi”.
Ndipo Jezu adayamba kuwauza mfananizo wakuti: “Mwamuna m'bodzi adabzala m'munda wa uva, adaukumbiza kuna alimi anango ndipo adayenda ulendo bwa nthawe ikulu.
Pomwe nthawe yakubvuna idakwana, iye adatumiza wabasa wace m'bodzi kuna wakulima wale kuti akamupase cipande ca bzisapo bza m'mundamo. Tsono wakulimawo adamumenya ndipo adam'bweza cimanja-manja.
Iye adatumiza wabasa winango, tsono umweyombo adamumenya ndipo adamunyaza acimubweza cimanja-manja.
Iye adatumiza pomwe wacitatu, ndipo iwo adamupweteka acimuthotha.
“Ndipo mwenekaciro wa mundayo adalewa kuti: ‘Kodi ndicite tani? Ndin'tuma mwana wangu wakufunika. Pinango pentse angadzamulemekeze’.
“Tsono pomwe alimi adamuwona, adapangana adati: ‘Umweyu ndiye wautaka. Mbatimupheni, ndipo utaka udzakhala bwathu’.
Tenepo iwo, adamuthusa kunja kwa munda ndipo adamupha.
“Kodi mwenekaciro wa munda aniwacita ciyani tsono?
An'dzabwera, acipha alimi wale ndipo mundayo an'dzapasa anango”.
Pomwe mbumba idabva bzimwebzo, idati: “Bzimwebzi bzireke kucitika cipo!”
Tsono Jezu adawanyang'anisisa ndipo adawabvundza kuti: “Tsono, bzinilewa ciyani bzomwe bzidanembedwa kuti:
“‘Mwala omwe wakumanga nyumba adaulamba,
udakhala mwala wapagonyo’”.
“Centse comwe cin'dzagwera pa mwala umweyu cin'dzagwatika-gwatika, ndipo ule omwe an'dzagweredwa na iwo, an'dzasanduka pfumbi”.

Ndipo apfundzisi wa mtemo na akulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe akhanyang'ana njira yakufuna kumumanga pamwepo letu, nakuti akhadazindikira kuti akhalewa iwo pomwe adalewa mfananizo umweyo. Tsono iwo akhana mantha na mbumba.

Ndipo pakum'fambira m'mbuyo, iwo adatuma wanthu wakutapa mkanwa omwe akhabzilatiza ninga wabwino kuti aphate Jezu pa cinthu comwe mumafala yomwe angadalewayo, mwakuti akwanise kumupereka kuna akulu wa utongi.
Tenepoyo wakufambira m'mbuyowo adati: “Misiri tin'dziwa kuti umbalewa na kupfundzisa bzomwe ni bzabwino, ndipo mulibe tsankho na wanthu. Tsono mumbapfundzisa njira ya Mulungu malinge na cadidi.
Kodi ni bzabwino kupima mtsonko kuna Seza, ayai ni bzabwino lini?”
Tsono Jezu akhadziwa kale ndzeru zawo ndipo adawatawira kuti:
“Ndilatizeni kobiri ibodzi in'cemeredwa denariyo. Kodi nkhopeyi na dzina bzomwe bziri pana iwo, ni bza yani?”
Iwo adatawira kuti: “Ni bza Seza”.
Iye adawauza kuti: “Na tenepo, pasani Seza bzomwe ni bza Seza, ndipo Mulungu bzomwe ni bza Mulungu”.
Ndipo iwo alibe kukwanisa kumutapa mkanwa pa fala liri-lentse patsogolo pa mbumba. Mwakudabwa na katawiridwe kace, adakhala zii.
Ndipo aSadusi anango, omwe ambalewa kuti palibe kulamuka kwa wakufa, adafendera kuna Jezu na mbvundzo wakuti:
“Misiri, Mozeji adatisiyira manemba yakuti penu m'bale wa mwamuna akafa acisiya mkazi alibe wana, umweyo bzin'funika kuti alowole mansiwayo kuti abalire wana m'bale wace.
Ndipo akhalipo abale anomwe. Wakuyamba adalowola ndipo adafa alibe kusiya wana.
Waciwiri
na wacitatu ndipombo anangowo adamulowola. Wentsenewo anomwe adafa, alibe kusiya wana.
Pakumalizira mkaziyo adadzafambo.
Kodi pantsiku yakudzalamuka kwa wakufa mkaziyo an'dzakhala wa yani, nakuti anomwe wentsenewo akhadamulowola?”.
Jezu adawatawira aciti: “Wana wa pantsi pano ambalowola na kulowozana,
tsono wale omwe angayesedwe wakuthemera kucita cipande ca dziko lomwe lirikubwera ndipo na kulamuka kwa wakufa iwo an'dzalowola lini ayai kudzalowozana,
ndipo iwo an'dzafa lini pomwe, nakuti ali ninga anju. Ni wana wa Mulungu, nakuti ni wana wa kulamuka kwa wakufa.

Bzakuti wakufa an'dzalamuka pomwe, Mozeji adalatiza kale pa bzakunemba bzomwe bzimbalewa citsamba comwe cikhagaka moto, pomwe iye adacemera Mbuya kuti: ‘Mulungu wa Abrahamu, Mulungu wa Izaki na Mulungu wa Jakobo’.
Ndipo Iye ni Mulungu lini wa wakufa, tsono ni Mulungu wa wamoyo, nakuti kwa Iye wentse ana moyo”.
Anango wa adziwi wa mtemo anango adamuuza kuti: “Misiri, watawira bwino!”.
Na tenepo, palibe kuwoneka winango wakumubvundza pomwe.
Pamwepo Jezu adawabvundza kuti: “Koni mumbalewa tani kuti Krixtu ni mwana wa Davidi?
“Davide caiyeyo ambalewa mulivu la Masalimu kuti:
“‘Mbuya adalewa kuna Mbuya wangu kuti:
Khala kuboko langu lamadidi,
mpaka ine ndiikhe
anyamadulanthaka wako ninga cakupondera
ca minyendo yako’.
Tenepoyo Davidi adamucemera ‘Mbuya’. Tsono, iye angakhale tani mwana wace?”
Pomwe mbumba yentse ikhamutetekera, Jezu adauza ateweri wace kuti:
“Cenjerani na adziwi wa mtemo. Iwo ambafuna kufamba adabvala bzakudeka, ndipo ambafuna kwene-kwene kumusidwa mumisika ndipo ambafuna kukhala mumbuto zabwino munyumba zakupemba na mu makondwereso.
Iwo ambadzonga munyumba za amansiwa, ndipo kuti apulumbudze ambacita mipembo ya mwa nthawe itali. Amuna amwewa an'dzapasidwa nyathwa ikulu kwene-kwene”.
Ndipo Jezu adanyang'anisisa adawona wanthu wakudala acimbaikha cakupereka cawo mukaxa ya bzakupereka.
Iye adawonambo mamsiwa wakusauka acithusa tukobiri twace tuwiri.
Ndipo Jezu adalewa kuti: “Nin'kuuzani kuti mamsiwa wakusaukayu wapereka bzizinji kuposa anangowa wentse.
Wentsenewa apereka bzomwe bzasalira. Tsono iye, pa usauki bwace, wapereka bzentse bzomwe akhali nabzo kuti bzimuthandizepa moyo wace”.
Ateweri wace anango akhambasimba bza mantikade ya Nyumba ya Mulungu na minyala yabwino ndipo na bzakuperekedwa kuna Mulungu. Tsono Jezu adalewa kuti:
“Bzimwebzi bzomwe imwepo mulikuwona, zin'dzafika nsiku zakuti pan'dzakhala lini mwala padzulu pa undzace. Minyala yentse in'dzagumulidwa”.
Pamwepo iwo adamubvundza kuti: “Misiri, kodi bzin'dzacitika lini bzinthu bzimwebzi? Ndipo ni ciratizo ciponi comwe cin'dzawonesa kuti bziri pafupi kucitika?”
Iye adawatawira kuti: “Cenjerani kuti muleke kupumpsidwa. Nakuti azinji an'dzabwera mudzina langu, acidzati: ‘Ndine-pano’, ndipo ‘Nthawe yafendera’. Lekani kudzawatewera.
Ndipo mukadzabva kulewa bza nkhondo na kusandukirana, lekani kudzabva mantha. Bzin'funika kuti pakuyamba bzidzacitike bzinthu bzimwebzi, tsono kumala kwa dziko kun'dzafika lini nthawe imweyo-letu”.
Patsogolo pace adati: “Dziko na dziko lin'dzamenyana, umambo na umambo bun'dzamenyana.
Pan'dzawoneka kutekenyeka kukulu kwa pantsi, njala ndipo kun'dzawoneka nthenda mumbuto zakusiyana-siyana, na malengwa yakugosva ndipo kun'dzawoneka bzilatizo bzikulu bzakucokera kudzulu.

“Tsono bzikanati kucitika bzinthu bzentsenebzi, iwo an'dzakumangani, acidzakufambirani m'mbuyo. Pamwepo an'dzakuperekani munyumba za mipembo na mkawoko, ndipo imwepo mun'dzayendesedwa patsogolo pa azimambo na atongi wa bzigawo, thangwe ra dzina langu.
Ndipo bzimwebzo bzin'dzakhala mpata wakuti imwepo mudzandicitire umboni.
Tsono dziwiratuni kuyambira tsapano lino kuti lekani kuneseka na bzomwe mun'dzalewa pakubzikhocerera.
Nakuti Ine nin'dzakupasani bzakulewa na udziwi bwakuti palibe na m'bodziyo wa anyamadulanthaka wanu an'dzakwanisa kulimbikira ayai kugaza.
Imwepo mun'dzaperekedwa ngakhale na azibaba wanu caiwo, abale wanu, anantsi na axamwali wanu, ndipo anango wa imwepo an'dzaphedwa na iwo.
Ndipo wentse an'dzakuwengani thangwe ra dzina langu.
Tsono palibe tsisi na libodziro la mumsolo mwanu lomwe lin'dzataika.
Kulimbika kokha ndiko kun'dzacitisa kuti imwepo mukhale na moyo.
“Mukadzawona Jerusalema idazunguliridwa na mthithi wa acikunda, imwepo mun'dzadziwa kuti kupfudzidwa kwayene kuli pafupi.
Pamwepo omwe an'dzakhala ali muJudeya adzathawire kumapiri, omwe an'dzakhala ali mumzinda adzacoke, ndipo omwe an'dzakhala ali m'munda adzaleke kupita mumzinda.
Nakuti ntsiku zimwezo zin'dzakhala za kuboneresedwa, zakuti bzikwanirisidwe bzentse bzomwe bzidanembedwa.
Tsoka kuna akazi ana pathupi na kwa wale omwe an'dzakhala alikumamisa! Nakuti pantsi pano pan'dzawoneka matsautso makulu, na ukali kuna mbumba imweyi.
Ndipo azinji an'dzaphedwa na bzisenga ndipo an'dzatengedwa ninga anyagirinya wa madziko yentse. Jerusalema an'dzapondedwa na wanthu omwe ni aJuda lini, mpaka kudzamala kwa nthawe ya wanthuwo.
“Ndipo kun'dzawoneka bziratizo kudzuwa, kumwezi, na kunyenyezi. Padziko la pantsi, mbumba zin'dzadandaula na mantha makulu thangwe ra kuwunga kwa mabimbi ya nyandza.
Ndipo wanthu an'dzafumphira na mantha ya kukumbukira bzinthu bzomwe bzin'dzabwera padziko. Ndipo mphambvu zomwe ziri kudzulu zin'dzatekenyesedwa.
Pamwepo mun'dzawona Mwana wa Munthu alikubwera mumtambo na mphambvu ndipo na mbiri ikulu.
Bzikadzayamba kucitika bzinthu bzimwebzi, mudzalamuke mudzalamuse msolo, thangwe cipulumuso canu ciri pafupi”.
Ndipo Jezu adawapasa mfananizo wakuti: “Wonerani kumkuyu na miti yentse.
Pomwe mitiyo in'phukira masamba, imwepo-letu mumbazindikira ndipo mumbadziwa kuti maindza yali pafupi.
Tenepoyombo, mukadzawona bzinthu bzimwebzi bzirikucitika, dziwani kuti Umambo bwa Mulungu buli pafupi.
“Ine nin'kukuuzani kuti m'badwe umweyu un'dzamala lini bzinthu bzentsenebzi bzikanati kucitika.
Kudzulu na pantsi bzin'dzamala, tsono mafala yanguya yan'dzamala lini cipo.
“Khalani na cheru, kuti mtima wanu uleke kutengeka na maphwandu, kuledzera na nkhumbukira za makhalidwe ya pantsi pano, kuti ntsiku imweyo ingadzafike mwakadzidzidzi, ninga kugwa kwa diwa.
Thangwe ntsikuyo in'dzabwera kwa wentse omwe alikukhala padziko la pantsi lentse.
Khalani wakufungula maso nthawe zentse ndipo pembani kuti imwepo muleke kudzagumanidwa na bzinthu bzentsenebzi bzomwe bzin'dzacitika, ndipo mukhale dzololo patsogolo pa Mwana wa Munthu”.
Jezu akhambapfundzisa ntsiku zentse m'Nyumba ya Mulungu. Ndipo kukadoka, akhakwira muphiri lakucemeredwa phiri la Oliva.
Ndipo mbumba yentse ikhabesera kuyenda m'Nyumba ya Mulungu kukamubva.
Ndipo ikhafendera nthawe ya cikondweso ca pau zakusaya cakufufumisa, cakucemeredwa Paxkwa.
Akulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe na adziwi wa Mtemo akhanyang'ana njira yakuti aphe Jezu, tsono iwo akhana mantha na mbumba.
Pamwepo Sathani adapita kuna Judasi, wakucemeredwa Isikaliyoti, m'bodzi wa khumi na awiri wale.
Judayo adayenda kukapangana na akulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe na atsogoleri wa acikunda wakulindira Nyumba ya Mulungu, ndipo adalewa nawo momwe angadaperekera Jezu.
Iwo adakondwa nabzo kwene-kwene, ndipo adamuuza kuti an'dzamupasa kobiri.
Ndipo Judasi adabvuma, adayamba kumbanyang'ana mpata wakuti apereke Jezu, mbumba palibe.
Ndipo idafika ntsiku ya pau zakusaya cakufufumisa, yomwe ikhafunika kuti aphedwe bira wakupereka ntsembe ya Paxkwa.
Jezu adatuma Pedru na Juwau, adawauza kuti: “Ndokoni mukakondze ciraliro ca Paxkwa”.
Iwo adabvundza kuti: “Kodi mun'funa kuti tikakondzere kuponi?”.
Iye adawatawira aciti: “Pakupita mumzinda, mun'kawona mwamuna m'bodzi adasendza tacu ya madzi. Mukamutewere mpaka panyumba yomwe iye an'kapita,
ndipo mukauze mwenekaciro wa nyumbayo kuti: ‘Misiri watituma kudzabvundza kuti: “Ni cipinda ciponi ca alendo comwe nin'dzadyera Paxkwa na ateweri wangu?” ’
Iye an'kakulatizani nyumba ikulu ya mudzaulu yomwe ina bzombo bzentse. Imwepo kakondzereni mumwemo”.
Ndipo iwo adayenda adakawona bzentse ninga momwe Jezu adawauzira. Pamwepo adakondza Paxkwayo.
Pomwe nthawe idakwana, Jezu na ateweri wace adakhala pameza.
Ndipo Iye adawauza kuti: “Ndikhafunisisa kuti ndidye pabodzi na imwe Paxkwayi ndikanati kubonera.
Nakuti Ine nin'kuuzani kuti nin'dzaidya lini pomwe, mpaka Paxkwayi idzakwanirisidwe muUmambo bwa Mulungu”.
Ndipo adatenga mkombo aciusimba adati: “Tambirani pasanani wina na mwandzace.
Nakuti Ine nin'kuuzani kuti nin'dzamwa lini pomwe cisapo ca uva, mpaka kufika kwa Umambo bwa Mulungu”.
Ndipo Iye adatenga pau aciisimba, adaibedula ndipo adapereka kuna ateweri, adati: “Iri ni thupi rangu lomwe lin'dzaperekedwa thangwe ra imwe. Mbacitani bzimwebzi mucimbandikumbukira”.
Bzibodzi-bodzibzo, pomwe adamala kudya, adatenga mkombo aciti: “Mkomboyu ni cipangano cipsa ca mulopa wangu, udayerera thangwe ra imwe.
“Tsono boko la ule omwe an'ndipereka liri pabodzi na langu pameza.
Nakuti Mwana wa Munthu aniyenda, ninga momwe bzidatalidwa. Tsono tsoka kuna ule omwe an'ndipereka!”.
Ndipo iwo adayamba kumbabvundzana kuti mbani wa iwo akhafuna kucita bzomwebzire.
Padawonekambo kunesana pakati pawo, thangwe rakuti mbani wa iwo akhawonedwa ninga mkulu.
Jezu adawauza kuti: “Azimambo wa mbumba ambaitonga mbumbayo. Ndipo omwe ni atongi ambadzicemera kuti wanthu wabwino.
Tsono, kwa imwe ni tenepoyo lini. Kusiyana kwace ni kwakuti, mkulu pakati panu bzin'funika kuti akhale ninga m'ng'ono. Ndipo ule omwe antonga akhale ninga wakutumikira.
Nakuti mkulu mbani, ule omwe ali pameza ayai ule omwe alikutumikira? Kodi mkulu ni ule lini omwe ali pameza? Tsono Ine ndiri pakati panu ninga wakutumikira.
Imwepo ndimwe mumbakhala muli cipande cangu pakubonera kwangu kwentse.
Ndipo Ine nin'kupasani Umambo, tenepoyo ninga Baba wangu adapasa Ine,
kuti imwepo mukwanise kudya na kumwa na Ine pameza yangu muUmambo bwangu ndipo mun'dzakhale pa mipando, mucidzatonga madzindza khumi na mawiri (12) ya Ijirayeri.
“Simau, Simau, Sathani wakukumbira kuti akupepeteni ninga tirigu.
Tsono Ine ndapemba kale kuti cikhulupiro cako cisaye kumala. Ndipo iwepo ukadzatendeuka udzakhwimisembo abale wako”.
Tsono iye adatawira kuti: “Mbuya, ndidakondzeka kuti ndiyende na imwe kukawoko napo kukafa”.
Jezu adamutawira kuti: “Ine nin'kuuza Pedru kuti, lero congwe akanati kulira katatu, iwepo un'dzandiramba kuti un'ndidziwa lini”.
Pamwepo Jezu adawabvundza kuti: “Kodi pomwe Ine ndidakutumani mulibe budu, sakha wa ulendo ayai xango, ciripo cinthu comwe mudasaya?”
Iwo adatawira kuti: “Palibe”.
Jezu adawauza kuti: “Tsono tsapano, penu imwepo muna budu, takulani ndipombo sakha waulendo. Ndipo penu mulibe cisenga, gulisani bhachi lanu mugule cisenga.

Nakuti bzidanembedwa kuti: ‘Ndipo Iye adayesedwa ninga kambowa’, ndipo Ine nin'kuuzani kuti bzimwebzi bzin'funika kuti bzicitike kuna Ine. Inde ni tenepoyo, bzomwe bzidanembedwa cipande ca Ine bzin'funika kuti bzikwanirisidwe”.
Ndipo ateweri wace adatawira kuti: “Wonani, Mbuya, ibzi bzisenga bziwiri”. Iye adawatawira adati: “Bzin'kwana!”.
Ndipo ninga mwa cizolowezi, Jezu adayenda kuPhiri la Oliva, ndipo ateweri wace adamutewera.
Pomwe adafika pambutopo adawauza kuti: “Pembani kuti musaye kugwera mukuyezedwa”.
Ndipo Iye adafundukira pang'ono kuna iwo, adagodama acimbapemba aciti:
“Baba, mukafuna cosani m'komboyu kuna Ine. Sikuti na kufuna kwangu tsono na kufuna kwanu”.
Ndipo adawoneka anju wa kudzulu omwe akhambamulimbisa.
Jezu akhadatsukwala tenepo, Iye adapemba na mphambvu kwene-kwene. Ndipo kaluma yace yikhali ninga mathotho ya mulopa yomwe yakhagwera pantsi.
Pomwe adaimirira watamala kupemba, adabwerera kuna ateweri wace, acikawagumana adagona thangwe ra kutsukwala.
Adawabvundza kuti: “Thangwe ranyi mulikugona? Lamukani ndipo pembani kuti imwepo musaye kugwera mukuyezedwa!”.
Pomwe Iye akhalewa-lewapo, udafika mthithi wa wanthu ukhatsogolerewa na Judasi, m'bodzi wa ateweri wace khumi na awiri. Ndipo iye adafendera pakhana Jezu kuti amumuse na mpsompsono.
Tsono Jezu adamubvundza kuti: “Judasi, kodi iwepo ulikupereka Mwana wa Munthu na mpsompsono?”
Omwe akhali na Jezu pomwe adawona bzomwe bzingadacitika, adamubvunza kuti: “Mbuya, tiwateme na bzisenga?”
Ndipo m'bodzi wa iwo adapweteka acigwata khutu la madidi la wabasa wa mkulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe.
Tsono Jezu adawatawira kuti: “Ndimo!” Ndipo ataphata khutu la munthuyo adamulimbisa.

Pamwepo Jezu adabvundza akulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe, atsogoleri wa alindiri wa Nyumba ya Mulungu na atsogoleri wa wanthu omwe akhadabwera kudzamunyang'ana aciti: “Kodi Ine-pano ndirikutsogolera gulu la akambowa kuti imwepo mubwere na bzisenga na mpsimbo?
Ntsiku zentse ndikhali na imwe m'Nyumba ya Mulungu, ndipo imwe mulibe kundimanga. Tsono ino ni nthawe yanu pomwe m'dima ulikutonga”.
Ndipo adamuphata aciyenda naye kunyumba ya mkulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe. Ndipo Pedru akhambawatewera na patali.
Tsono pomwe adaphatiza moto pakati pa cimtalo ca nyumbayo iwo adakhala mumbali mwa moto ndipo Pedru adayenda acikhalambo nawo pabodzi.
Pomwe mtsikana wabasa adamuwona adakhala paceza ca moto. Ndipo adamunyang'anisisa acilewa kuti: “Mwamuna umweyu akhali pabodzi na Iye”.
Tsono Pedru adagaza aciti: “Mkaziwe, ndinimudziwa lini”.
Padandopita nthawe pang'ono, mwamuna winango adamuwona aciti: “Iwepo ndiwe m'bodzi wace”.
Pedru adatawira kuti: “Mwamunawe ndine-pano lini!”.
Padandopita pomwe nthawe ibodzi yokha, munango adalewa pomwe kuti: “Cadidi mwamuna umweyu akhali na Iye, nakuti ni munthuwa kuGalireya”.
Ndipo Pedru adatawira kuti: “Mwamunawe nin'dziwa lini bzomwe iwepo ulikulewa!” Pomwe akhalewa bzimwebzo, congwe adalira.
Ndipo Mbuya adaceuka acinyang'anisa Pedru. Pamwepo Pedru adakumbukira bzomwe Mbuya akhadamuuza kuti: “Lero congwe akanati kulira un'dzandiramba katatu”.
Ndipo Pedru atacoka pamwepo, adalira kwene-kwene na ciya.
Amuna omwe akhakoya Jezu akhambamusinjirira ndipo akhamumenya.
Ndipo adamumpsinkha maso acimbamubvundza kuti: “Vima! Mbani omwe wakumenyayu?”.
Ndipo akhamulewa mafala yanango mazinji yakutukwana.
Pomwe kudacena, lidatsonkhana gulu la akulu-akulu wa Ajuda, na akulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe na adziwi wa Mtemo, ndipo Jezu adatengedwa aciyendesedwa kuna iwo.
Ndipo iwo adamubvundza kuti: “Penu iwepo ndiwe Krixtu, tiuze”.
Pamwepo Jezu adatawira kuti: “Napo ndicikuuzani imwepo mun'bvuma lini
ndipo Ine ndicikubvundzani, mun'nditawira lini.
Tsono kuyambira tsapano lino kuyenda kutsogolo, Mwana wa Munthu an'dzakhala kuboko ladidi la Mulungu Wamphambvu-Zentse”.
Pamwepo wentse adamubvundza aciti: “Tsono, iwepo ndiwe Mwana wa Mulungu?”
Iye adawatawira aciti: “Imwepo ndimwe mulikulewa kuti Ine ndine”.
Pamwepo iwo adalewa kuti: “Kodi tirikufuniranyi umboni bunango? Nakuti ife tabzibvera tekha mafala ya pamulomo pace”.
Ndipo gulu lentse lidalamuka liciyenda na Jezu kuna Pirato.

Ndipo iwo adayamba kumunamizira aciti: “Munthuyu tidamugumana acimbapumpsa wanthu kuti asandulukire dziko lathu. Iye alikuwaletsa kupima mtsonkho kuna Seza ndipo Iye caiye alikulewa kuti ni Krixtu, Mambo”.
Ndipo Pirato adabvundza Jezu kuti: “Kodi iwepo ndiwe mambo wa aJuda?”
Tsono Jezu adamutawira aciti: “Iwepo ndiwe wabzirewa”.
Pamwepo Pirato adauza akulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe na mthithi wa wanthu kuti: “Ndiri kuwona lini thangwe ra kum'pasa mulandu munthuyu”.
Tsono iwo akhangingimira acimbati: “Iye alikupumpsa mbumba yentse ya muJudeya na pfundziso lace. Adayambira kuGalireya mpaka kufika kuno”.
Pomwe Pirato adabva bzimwebzo, adabvundza kuti penu Jezu akhali wa kuGalireya.
Pomwe adadziwa kuti akhali wa kudziko lomwe likhatongedwa na Herodi, adamutumiza kuna Herodi omwe akhalimbo kuJerusalema panthawe imweyo.
Pomwe Herodi adawona Jezu, adakondwa kwene-kwene, thangwe pakhadapita nthawe itali akhabva mbiri yace akhafuna kumuwona. Ndipo akhadikhira kuti amuwona alikucita bzidabwiso.
Iye adamupasa mibvundzo mizinji, tsono Jezu alibe kumutawira.
Ndipo akulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe na adziwi wa Mtemo akhali pamwepo, acimbamupasa mulandu mwa mphambvu.
Pamwepo Herodi na acikunda wace adamunyoza ndipo akhambamuseka. Adamubvazika cakubvala ca umambo acimubwezera kuna Pirato.
Herodi na Pirato omwe akhabverana lini, pantsiku imweyo adayamba kuxamwalizana.
Ndipo Pirato adatsonkhanisa akulu wa azibaba wa ntsembe, atongi na mbumba,
aciwauza kuti: “Imwepo mwandibweresera munthuyu ninga wakupumpsa mbumba. Tsono ine ndamupasa mibvundzo patsogolo panu ndipo ndiribe kuwona pakuyambira kuti ndimupase mulandu omwe mulikumupasa.
Napombo Herodi, ndipopo iye adamubwezera kuna ife. Ninga momwe mulikuwoneramu, Iye alibe kucita na cinthuco comwe cingacitise kuti aphedwe.
Na tenepo, ine nin'dzamupasa nyathwa ndikamala ndicimuleka aciyenda”.
Ndipo Piratoyo bzikhafunika kuti awatsudzulire wam'kawoko m'bodzi panthawe ya cikondwereso.
Ndipo wanthu wentsene wale adakuwa kabodzi na kabodzi adati: “Mumalizeni umweyo! Titsudzulireni Barabasi!”
Tsono Barabasiyo akhali m'kawoko na thangwe ra kunyosa phiringu mumzinda na kupha wanthu.
Pirato pakufuna kuti atsudzule Jezu, adayenda pomwe kuna iwo.
Tsono iwo adapitiriza kukuwa aciti: “Mukhomerereni! Mukhomerereni!”
Ndipo kacitatu iye adawabvundza kuti: “Thangwe ranyi? Ni cakuipa canyi comwe wacita munthuyu? Ndiribe kuwona thangwe lomwe lingacitise kuti aphedwe. Ndinimupasa nyathwa, ndicimuleka aciyenda”.
Tsono iwo akhakumbira mwakungingimira, na kukuwa kwa mphambvu, kuti Iye akhomereredwe. Ndipo kukuwa kwawo kukhapitiriza.
Pamwepo Pirato adabvuma kucita bzomwe iwo akhakumbirabzo.
Adatsudzula munthu omwe akhadaikhidwa m'kawoko na thangwe ra kunyosa phiringu na kupha wanthu, ule omwe iwo akhadakumbira, ndipo adapereka Jezu ninga bzomwe iwo akhafuna.
Pomwe akhayenda naye, adaphata Simau wa kuSireni, omwe akhafika kucokera kumunda, ndipo adamutakulisa m'tanda kuti atewere nawo Jezu.
Ndipo mthithi ukulu wa wanthu ukhamutewera, kuphatanidza na akazi omwe akhamenya pacifuwa acimbadandaula na kulira thangwe ra Iye.
Jezu adaceuka aciwauza kuti: “Wana wacikazi wa kuJerusalema, lekani kulira Ine. Bzirireni mwekha imwepo na wana wanu!
Nakuti ntsiku zidzafika zakuti imwepo mun'dzalewa kuti: ‘Wakusimbidwa ni omwe anibala lini, na nthumbo zomwe zikanati kubala ndipo na masuku yomwe yakanati kumamisa!’
“‘Pantsiku imweyo,
“‘an'dzauza mapiri kuti:
“Tigwereni!”
Ndipo tumapiri kuti: “Timpsinkheni!” ’.
Nakuti, penu alikucita bzimwebzi kuna muti uwisi, kodi kuna muti wakuuma ndiye tani tsono?”
Ndipo amuna anango awiri, omwe akhali akambowa, adatengewambo pabodzi na Jezu, kuti akaphedwe.
Pomwe adafika pambuto yomwe ikhacemeredwa Nkhadzi, adakhomerera Jezu pabodzi na akambowa pamwepo, m'bodzi kuboko ladidi winango ladzere.
Ndipo Jezu adalewa kuti: “Baba, alekerereni nakuti iwo an'dziwa lini bzomwe alikucita”. Pamwepo iwo adagawana bzakubvala bzace mwakucita mayere.
Mbumba ikhawona, ndipo atongi akhamunyoza acimbalewa kuti: “Adapulumusa anango, bzipulumuse iwe wekha penu ndiwe Krixtu wa Mulungu, Wakusankhulidwa”.
Acikunda adafenderambo pana Iye, acimunyozambo. Adamupasa vinagre,
acimbalewa kuti: “Penu iwepo ndiwe mambo wa aJuda, bzipulumuse wekha”.
Ndipo padzulu pamtanda wace pakhana tsamba lomwe likhadanembedwa kuti:
a
Ndipo m'bodzi wa akambowa omwe akhadakhomereredwambo akhatukwana Jezu kuti: “Kodi iwepo ndiwe lini Krixtu? Bzipulumuse wekha na ifembo!”.
Tsono kambowa winangoyo adamutsimula, adati: “Kodi iwepo ulibe mantha na Mulungu, napo Iye acipasidwa nyathwa ibodzi-bodzi na ife?
Ife-pano tapasidwa nyathwa yakuthemera na bzomwe tacita. Tsono munthuyu alibe kucita cinthu cakuipa”.
Pamwepo iye adati: “Jezu, mundikumbukirembo mukapita muUmbambo bwanu”.
Jezu adamutawira kuti: “Ine nin'kutsimikizira kuti: Lero iwepo un'kakhala na ine kuParaizo”.
Tsono ikhali pafupi-fupi kukwana kati-na-kati ya masikati, ndipo m'dima udampsinkha dziko lentse la pantsi mpaka nthawe zitatu za kumaulo.
Dzuwa lidaleka kugaka, ndipo nguwo yakugwatisira M'nyumba ya Mulungu idang'ambika pakati-na-kati.
Pamwepo Jezu adakuwa kwene-kwene aciti: “Baba, ndiri kupereka mzimu wangu m'manja mwanu”. Atamala kulewa bzimwebzo, adafa.
Pomwe mkulu wa gulu la acikunda wa ciRoma adawona bzomwe bzidacitika, adatumbiza Mulungu adati: “Cadidi-letu munthuyu akhali wakulungama”.
Ndipo mbumba yentse yomwe ikhadatsonkhana kuti iwone bzomwe bzikhacitika, pomwe idawona bzimwebzo idayamba kubzimenya pacifuwa ndipo icimbafundukira.
Tsono wentse omwe akhamudziwa, kuphatanidza na akazi omwe akhadamutewera kuyambira kuGalireya adaima kutali, acimbawona bzikhacitikabzo.
